column2: Oh yes... It might be a bit dizzy at first.{nl}That is all part of the process in receiving the Divine Tree's blessing.
column3: 아.. 처음에는 조금 어지럽거나 할 수도 있습니다.{nl}그게 다 신수의 축복을 받아들이는 과정이지요.
column4: Oh ya... Mungkin sedikit pusing pada awalnya.{nl} Itu semua adalah bagian dari proses menerima Divine Tree's Blessing.

column2: How was your first sermon about the creed? {nl}Was it alright?{nl}
column3: 처음 교리를 들으셨는데 어떻습니까. {nl}괜찮으셨습니까?{nl}
column4: Bagaimana pengalaman pertamamu akan keyakinan ini?{nl}Apakah kamu baik-baik saja?{nl}

column2: Good, good.{nl}I welcome you once more.{nl}
column3: 다행이군요. {nl}다시 한번 환영합니다.{nl}
column4: Bagus, Bagus.{nl}Aku ucapkan selamat datang kembali padamu.{nl}

column2: Although the Divine Tree is benevolent, redemption does not come for free.{nl}You must work for the chance to be redeemed.{nl}
column3: 자비로운 신수시지만 구원은 거저 오는 것이 아닙니다.{nl}구원을 얻기 위해서는 그에 상응하는 노력을 해야하죠.{nl}
column4: Meskipun Divine Tree adalah sangat baik, penyelamatan tidak datang secara gratis.{nl} Kamu harus bekerja untuk mendapat kesempatan itu.{nl}

column2: Helping other believers might be a good place to start since you are new.{nl}I hope to see you soon.
column3: 처음이라 잘 모르실텐데 다른 신도들의 일을 도우며 할 일을 찾아보는 것도 좋겠군요.{nl}그럼 다음에 또 뵙도록 하겠습니다.
column4: Membantu believers lainnya mungkin merupakan hal yang tepat untuk memulai karena kamu orang baru.{nl} Saya harap untuk bisa melihatmu segera.

column2: Greetings. Brother.{nl}Have you received the Demon Soul Orb from Dominikas?{nl}
column3: 반갑습니다. 형제님.{nl}혹시 도미니카스님께 마족의 영혼 구슬을 받으셨나요?{nl}
column4: Salam. Saudaraku.{nl} Apakah kamu menerima Demon Soul Orb dari Dominikas?{nl}

column2: The demons will not attack you on sight if you hold an orb filled with their souls.{nl}It seems as if you have yet to receive the orb from Dominikas.{nl}
column3: 마족의 영혼이 채워져있는 영혼 구슬을 지니고 있으면 마족들이 먼저 공격하지 않아요.{nl}아무래도 형제님은 아직 도미니카스님께 영혼 구슬을 받지 못하신 것 같네요.{nl}
column4: Para demon tidak akan menyerangmu jika kamu memegang sebuah orb yang penuh dengan soul mereka.{nl} Tampak kamu belum menerima orb dari Dominikas.{nl}

column2: I have an extra Soul Orb.{nl}But... you'll have to fill it with demon souls yourself.{nl}
column3: 제게 여분의 영혼 구슬이 있어요.{nl}다만.. 마족의 영혼은 채워져 있지 않아서 직접 채우셔야 해요.{nl}
column4: Aku memiliki ekstra soul orb.{nl}Tapi... Kamu harus mengisinya sendiri dengan demon soul.{nl}

column2: Still, you won't have to worry about demons attacking you once it's filled with demon souls.{nl}The benevolent Divine Tree shall protect you.
column3: 그래도 마족의 영혼을 다 채우면 더 이상 먼저 공격받는 일은 없을 거예요.{nl}자비로운 신수께서 지켜주시는 셈이니까요.
column4: Namun, kamu tidak perlu khawatir dengan para demon yang menyerangmu setelah itu terisi dengan demon soul.{nl} Kebaikan Divine Tree akan melindungimu.

column2: I've learned that although demons are our enemies, they are also to be redeemed just like us.{nl}We will all become one in the blessings of the Divine Tree.
column3: 마족은 우리의 적이기도 하지만, 저희와 함께 구원받아야 할 존재라고 배웠어요.{nl}결국은 모든 게 신수의 품에서 하나가 될 테니까요.
column4: Saya telah mempelajari meskipun demon adalah musuh kita, mereka juga harus sucikan seperti kita.{nl} Kita semua akan menjadi satu dalam blessing dari Divine Tree.

column2: I see you've filled the orb.{nl}How was it? I assume the demons didn't attack you on the way back?{nl}
column3: 영혼 구슬을 채워 오셨군요.{nl}어때요? 돌아오는 길에는 마족들이 먼저 공격하지 않았지요?{nl}
column4: Aku lihat kamu telah mengisi orb tersebut.{nl}Bagaimana? aku rasa para demon tidak menyerangmu dalam perjalanan kembali?{nl}

column2: What? You were attacked?{nl}That's strange. It is most likely due to your lack of faith.{nl}
column3: 네? 공격을 받았다고요?{nl}이상하네요. 아마 그건 형제님의 믿음이 부족하기 때문일 거예요.{nl}
column4: Apa? Kamu diserang?{nl}Itu sangat aneh. Hal itu kemungkinan besar karena kurangnya rasa yakin.{nl}

column2: Ah, look at the time...{nl}Pardon me, I must prepare to attend an important ritual.
column3: 아, 벌써 시간이 이렇게..{nl}그럼 전 중요한 의식 참여를 준비해야해서 이만 실례할게요.
column4: Ah, lihat sudah waktunya...{nl} Maafkan aku, aku harus bersiap untuk menghadiri ritual penting.

column2: Welcome. You're the newcomer, right?{nl}I am selecting scriptures here.{nl}
column3: 어서 오세요. 오늘 입단하신 분이죠?{nl}저는 이곳에서 경전을 선별하고 있습니다.{nl}
column4: Selamat datang. Kamu orang baru, kan?{nl} Aku sedang memilih scriptures di sini.{nl}

column2: To us, the goddesses are immoral as only the Divine Tree can offer true redemption.{nl}We no longer need the old scriptures that worship the goddesses.{nl}
column3: 우리에게 있어서 여신은 배덕의 상징일 뿐, 신수만이 진정한 구원이거든요.{nl}여신을 숭배하는 낡은 경전 따위는 이제 필요 없는 거죠.{nl}
column4: Bagi kami, para goddess tidak bermoral karena hanya Divine Tree yang dapat menawarkan keselamatan.{nl} Kami tidak perlu lagi Scriptures lama yang menyakini para goddess.{nl}

column2: What do we do with the useless scriptures?{nl}We usually gather them and burn them.
column3: 필요 없는 경전은 어떻게 하냐고요?{nl}보통 한 곳에 모아서 불태워 버리죠.
column4: Apa yang kami lakukan dengan scripture yang tidak berguna?{nl}Kami biasanya mengumpulkan dan membakarnya.

column2: Thank you for saving me!{nl}Of course, this is all because of the blessing of the Divine Tree.{nl}
column3: 덕분에 살았습니다!{nl}이것도 다 신수께서 굽어 살펴주시기 때문이겠죠.{nl}
column4: Terima kasih karena telah menyelamatkanku!{nl}Tentu saja, ini semua karena blessing dari Divine Tree.{nl}

column2: Why do you think the demons attacked us?{nl}That is strange... This has never happened before.{nl}
column3: 그나저나 어째서 마족들이 우릴 공격한 걸까요?{nl}거 참, 이상하네요.. 지금까지 단 한번도 이런 일이 없었거든요. {nl}
column4: Mengapa kamu merasa para demon menyerang kami?{nl}Itu aneh... ini belum pernah terjadi sebelumnya.{nl}

column2: Farewell then... I need to attend a ritual.{nl}Make sure you're not late either, brother. I will see you later.
column3: 전 이만.. 의식에 참여하러 가봐야겠어요.{nl}형제님도 늦지 않게 오세요. 나중에 뵙겠습니다.
column4: Sampai jumpa... aku harus untuk menghadiri ritual.{nl} Pastikan kamu tidak terlambat, saudaraku. Aku akan menemuimu nanti.

column2: Villager James
column3: 마을 주민 제임스
column4: Villager James

column2: Oh, so you are the newcomer.{nl}It's a pleasure to meet you.{nl}
column3: 오, 새로 오신 형제님이로군.{nl}반갑네.{nl}
column4: Oh, jadi kamu adalah orang baru.{nl} Senang bertemu denganmu.{nl}

column2: I am purifying the corrupted power of the goddesses with the red blood of the demons. {nl}However, it seems that I've run out.{nl}
column3: 나는 여기서 마족의 붉은 피로 여신의 오염된 힘을 정화하고 있지.{nl}마침 그게 다 떨어졌구먼.{nl}
column4: Aku sedang memurnikan kekuatan buruk dari para goddess dengan red blood dari para demon.{nl}Namun, tampaknya aku sudah kehabisan.{nl}

column2: Normally Dominikas gets it for me but he seems to be busy at the moment.{nl}Not to mention the fact that we are currently under {nl}their protection so we can't attack them either.{nl}
column3: 보통 도미니카스님께서 구해주시지만, 지금은 바쁘신 것 같아.{nl}우리는 마족에게 보호를 받는 입장이기 때문에 마족을 공격할 수가 없어.{nl}
column4: Biasanya Dominikas memberikannya untukku tapi tampaknya ia sibuk saat ini.{nl} Belum lagi kita saat ini sedang dalam{nl} perlindungan mereka sehingga kita tidak bisa menyerang mereka.{nl}

column2: That's why I want you to go get some red demon blood.{nl}As a recruit you can do this much, no?
column3: 그래서 그런데 자네가 마족의 붉은 피를 구해다 주면 좋겠구먼.{nl}이 정돈 신입으로써 해줄 수 있겠지?
column4: Itu sebabnya aku ingin kamu pergi mendapatkan beberapa red demon blood.{nl} Sebagai orang baru kamu dapat melakukan hal ini, bukan?

column2: Thank you.{nl}Demon blood has a special power that can purify the corrupted power of the goddesses.{nl}
column3: 고맙네.{nl}마족의 피는 특별한 힘이 있기 때문에 여신의 오염된 힘을 정화시킬 수 있지.{nl}
column4: Terima kasih.{nl} Demon blood memiliki kekuatan khusus yang dapat memurnikan kekuatan buruk dari para goddess.{nl}

column2: Look around you, all of this was the result of my purification.{nl}How about it, beautiful isn't it?{nl}
column3: 주위를 둘러보게. 이게 모두 내가 정화해낸 작품이라네.{nl}어때. 아름답지 않은가?{nl}
column4: Lihatlah di sekitarmu, semua ini adalah hasil dari pemurnianku.{nl} Bagaimana, indah bukan?{nl}

column2: Well it's about time I leave.{nl}You're free to wander the monastery but try not to go near {nl}the black wall in the Annex Laboratory up there.{nl}{nl}
column3: 이런. 이만 가봐야 할 시간이군.{nl}수도원을 자유롭게 다니는 건 좋지만, 저 윗쪽 별관 연구실에 있는 검은 벽에는 가까이 가지 말게.{nl}
column4: Nah sudah waktunya aku pergi.{nl} Kamu bebas untuk berkeliling di monastery tetapi cobalah untuk tidak pergi mendekati{nl} Black Wall di Annex Laboratory di sana.{nl}{nl}

column2: That wall is full of holy energy so that only those chosen {nl}by the Divine Tree such as Dominikas can go there.{nl}Well then, see you later.
column3: 그 벽은 너무나도 신성해서 신수께서 선택한 도미니카스님께서만 지나다니실 수 있으니까.{nl}그럼 나중에 봅세.
column4: Dinding yang penuh energi suci sehingga hanya mereka yang terpilih{nl} oleh Divine Tree seperti Dominikas yang bisa pergi ke sana.{nl}Baik kalau begitu, Sampai jumpa.

column2: ...How did you get in here?{nl}This is a sacred place that only those who are chosen by the Divine Tree may enter.{nl}
column3: ..어떻게 이 곳에 들어오신 건지?{nl}여긴 신수께서 선택한 자만이 들어올 수 있는 신성한 곳인데..{nl}
column4: ...Bagaimana kau bisa berada di sini?{nl} Ini adalah tempat suci yang hanya mereka yang dipilih oleh Divine Tree dapat masukinya.{nl}

column2: Oh my, it appears that the Divine Tree has already chosen you.{nl}I knew you were something special the moment I laid my eyes upon you.
column3: 이런, 이런.. 이미 신수께서 당신을 선택하셨나보군요.{nl}처음 뵈었을 때부터 뭔가 범상치 않으시다 했더니..
column4: Oh, tampak Divine Tree telah memilihmu.{nl} Aku tahu kamu memiliki sesuatu yang istimewa saat aku melihatmu.

column2: To think that you were chosen the moment you joined, this is quite an amazing turn of events.{nl}There is a very important ritual coming up... a ritual to bestow the Divine Tree's blessings.
column3: 입단하시자마자 신수께 선택을 받으시다니, 참으로 경탄스러운 일입니다.{nl}마침 중요한 의식을 앞두고 있는데.. 그 의식에서 신수의 축복을 내려드리지요.{nl}
column4: Kamu terpilih saat kamu baru bergabung, ini cukup peristiwa ini sangat menakjubkan.{nl} Ada ritual yang sangat penting yang perlu kulakukan... ritual untuk melimpahkan Divine Tree's blessings.

column2: All the other followers are waiting at the passage that leads to the annex.{nl}Although I must go ahead in order to prepare for the ritual, please take your time.
column3: 다른 신도들도 벌써 본원으로 가는 통로에 모여서 기다리고 있을 겁니다.{nl}저도 먼저 가서 의식을 준비하고 있을테니 천천히 오십시오.
column4: Semua pengikut lain sedang menunggu di jalan yang mengarah ke annex.{nl} Meskipun saya harus pergi ke terlebih dahulu untuk mempersiapkan ritual, silahkan nikmati waktumu.

column2: Hurry and deliver this.{nl}I can no longer stand to see the corrupted power of the goddesses.
column3: 어서 가져다주게.{nl}여신의 오염된 힘을 더는 눈 뜨고 못봐주겠어.
column4: Cepat dan memberikan ini.{nl}aku tidak tahan melihat kekuatan buruk dari para goddess.

column2: I feel an evil presence coming from the vines that Dominikas left behind.{nl}To think that our monastery might have been covered in such a thing, how frightening.
column3: 도미니카스가 남겨놓고 간 저 나무 덩굴에서 사악한 기운이 느껴져요{nl}저런 게 우리 수도원을 휘감을 걸 생각하니 정말 끔찍하네요.{nl}
column4: Saya merasakan aura jahat dari tanaman merambat yang Dominikas tinggalkan.{nl}Monastery kami mungkin telah dikelilingi olehnya, begitu mengerikan.

column2: Is there any way to get rid of those vines?
column3: 저 나무 덩굴을 아예 없애버릴 방법이 없을까요?
column4: Apakah ada cara untuk menyingkirkan tanaman rambat itu?

column2: Hmm...You say that you need a particular reagent to get rid of the vines?
column3: 음.. 나무 덩굴을 없앨 시약이 필요하다고?{nl}
column4: Hmm... Kamu bilang, kamu memerlukan reagent tertentu untuk menyingkirkan tanaman merambat itu?

column2: You've arrived at just the right time.{nl}The reagent that Vaidotas was working on is done.
column3: 때마침 잘 왔네. {nl}안 그래도 바이도타스가 알려준 대로 만든 시약이 완성됐거든.
column4: Kamu datang di waktu yang tepat.{nl}Reagent yang Vaidotas sedang kerjakan telah selesai.

column2: Here!{nl}I'll call it "Lucienne's Special Reagent"!{nl}
column3: 자!{nl}이름하여 루시엔의 특제 시약!{nl}
column4: Ini!{nl}Aku akan menyebutnya "Lucienne's Special Reagent"!{nl}

column2: ...What's wrong?{nl}It's real this time! I made sure it's safe this time!{nl}
column3: ..표정이 왜 그래?{nl}이번엔 진짜야! 안전하게 만들었다고!{nl}
column4: ...Ada apa?{nl}Kali ini adalah yang sesungguhnya! Aku memastikan itu aman kali ini!{nl}

column2: Even if you can't trust me you should trust Vaidotas!
column3: 나는 못 믿어도 바이도타스는 믿을 거 아니야!
column4: Meskipun jika kamu tidak dapat mempercayaiku tapi kamu harus percaya Vaidotas!

column2: Welcome back.{nl}Please hurry, I don't want to look at the terrible vines any longer.
column3: 다녀오셨습니까?{nl}어서 저 끔찍한 덩굴이 눈 앞에서 사라졌으면 좋겠어요.
column4: Selamat datang kembali.{nl} Tolong cepat, aku tidak ingin melihat tanaman merambat yang mengerikan itu lebih lama lagi.

column2: That's Winterspoon for you!{nl}It's almost like that vine was never there, thank you so much, Revelator!
column3: 역시 윈터스푼 가문답군요! {nl}덩굴이 깔끔하게 사라졌어요. 정말 감사합니다, 계시자님!
column4: Winterspoon itu untukmu!{nl}Hampir seperti tanaman rambat itu tidak pernah ada, terima kasih banyak, Revelator!

column2: Sorry for making you help us so much...{nl}We owe you our sincere thanks.
column3: 자꾸 도움만 받게 되는 것 같네요.. {nl}정말 감사합니다.
column4: Maaf telah membuatmu membantu kami begitu banyak...{nl} Kami berutang banyak terima kasih.

column2: I am talking about the scripture from the Order of the Tree of Truth left by Dominikas.{nl}It turns out that the impious thing still remains in the monastery.{nl}
column3: 도미니카스가 남겨두고 간 진리의 나무 교단 경전 말입니다.{nl}그런 불경스러운 것이 아직도 수도원에 남아 있더군요.{nl}
column4: Aku membicarakan tentang scripture dari Order of the Tree of Truth yang ditinggalkan oleh Dominikas.{nl}Ternyata hal-hal jahat masih berada di monastery.{nl}

column2: If you see the fake scripture, could you bring it to me?{nl}We're too short-handed to spare anyone at the moment...{nl}
column3: 혹시나 거짓된 경전을 보게 되신다면 꼭 가져다 주실 수 있을까요?{nl}일일히 수습하기엔 아직도 일손이 턱없이 부족하거든요..{nl}
column4: Jika kamu melihat scripture palsu, bisakah kamu membawanya kepadaku?{nl}Kami kekurangan orang untuk saat ini...{nl}

column2: Those at the Order of the Tree of Truth... to think they would corrupt the power of the goddesses...{nl}This is just blasphemy to the goddesses!
column3: 진리의 나무 교단 녀석들.. 여신의 힘이 오염되었다니..{nl}여신 모독도 적당히 해야 말이죠.
column4: Mereka yang berada pada Order of the Tree of Truth... berpikir mereka akan merusak kekuatan para goddess...{nl} Ini hanya penghujatan kepada para goddess!

column2: So you've found the fake scripture. Thank you.{nl}Give it to me and I will take care of it.
column3: 거짓된 경전을 찾으셨군요. 감사합니다.{nl}이리 주세요. 제가 처리하겠습니다.
column4: Jadi kamu telah menemukan scripture palsu. Terima kasih.{nl}Berikan padaku dan aku akan mengurusnya.

column2: S-Stop...!{nl}I will do whatever you ask me, so please stop!
column3: 그.. 그만!{nl}시키는 대로 다 할테니까 제발 그만하십시오!
column4: B-Berhenti...!{nl}Aku akan melakukan apa pun yang kamu mau, jadi tolong hentikan!

column2: Should I just join the Order of the Tree of Truth?{nl}If I did, would I be able to escape this hunger?
column3: 진리의 나무 교단에 입단하면 되는 겁니까?{nl}그럼 이 지긋지긋한 굶주림에서 해방시켜주는 거냐고요!
column4: Haruskah Aku bergabung dengan Order of the Tree of Truth?{nl}Jika aku melakukannya, akankah saya dapat terlepas dari rasa lapar ini?

column2: Lies...{nl}If not... How... The black wall...
column3: 거짓말..{nl}그럼 어떻게.. 검은 벽을..
column4: Bohong...{nl}Jika tidak... Bagaimana... Black Wall…

column2: It seems that he's been malnourished for a long time.{nl}I can't talk to him now.
column3: 오랜 굶주림에 시달린 것 같다.{nl}이 상태로는 대화가 불가능할 것 같다.
column4: Tampaknya ia telah kekurangan gizi dalam waktu yang lama.{nl}Aku tidak bisa bicara dengannya sekarang.

column2: Thank you so much...{nl}I am so sorry for misunderstanding you. I thought something was going wrong...{nl}
column3: 정말 감사합니다..{nl}아깐 오해해서 죄송했어요. 진짜 잘못되는줄 알고..{nl}
column4: Terima kasih banyak...{nl}Aku sangat menyesal atas kesalahpahaman kepadamu. Aku pikir ada sesuatu yang tidak beres...{nl}

column2: After I regained my consciousness, I felt this mysterious energy from you.{nl}What happened?{nl}
column3: 기운을 차리고 나니 당신에게서 신비한 기운이 느껴지는군요.{nl}여기로 들어오신 것도 그렇고.. 어떻게 된 일이지요?{nl}
column4: Setelah aku sadar, aku merasakankan energi misterius ini darimu.{nl} Apa yang terjadi?{nl}

column2: Ah... So you're the Revelator.{nl}I guess this is why the black wall couldn't block you.
column3: 아.. 어쩐지, 계시자셨군요.{nl}그래서 그 검은 벽이 계시자님을 막지 못했나봐요.
column4: Ah... Jadi kamu Revelator.{nl} Aku rasa inilah mengapa black wall tidak bisa menghalangimu.

column2: Thank you. I was able to survive because of you.{nl}Dominikas... He's more cruel than the demons.
column3: 감사합니다. 덕분에 살았네요.{nl}도미니카스.. 그 자는 마족보다도 더 지독한 사람입니다.
column4: Terima kasih. Aku bisa bertahan karenamu.{nl} Dominikas... Ia lebih kejam dari para demon.

column2: It hasn't been a long time since Dominikas visited the Elgos Monastery.{nl}I thought he was just an accompanying monk.{nl}
column3: 도미니카스는 여기 엘고스 수도원을 방문한지 그리 오래 되진 않았어요.{nl}처음엔 으레 들르던 수행 수도사인줄 알았지요.{nl}
column4: Itu belum lama sejak Dominikas mengunjungi Elgos Monastery.{nl} Aku pikir ia hanya seorang pendamping monk.{nl}

column2: Not so long after he came here, the tree vines and the {nl}demons suddenly swept the monastery annex.{nl}The villagers fled there... But, he stopped them appropriately.{nl}
column3: 그가 온지 얼마 안되지 않아 나무 덩굴과 마족들이 수도원 별관을 덮치더군요.{nl}거기엔 마을 사람들이 피난 와 있던 곳이였는데.. 그런데 그가 멋지게 막아내더라고요.{nl}
column4: Belum lama setelah ia datang ke sini, tanaman merambat dan{nl} para demon tiba-tiba menyerang monastery annex.{nl}Para penduduk desa melarikan diri dari sana... Tapi, ia menghentikan mereka.{nl}

column2: When I think about it, it was all a facade.{nl}The raid of the tree vines and the sudden attacks of the demons...{nl}
column3: 생각해 보면 전부 그의 자작극이였죠.{nl}나무 덩굴의 폭주도, 마족의 습격도..{nl}
column4: Ketika aku memikirkannya, itu semua hanya penghlihatan.{nl} Serangan dari tanaman merambat dan serangan tiba-tiba dari para demon...{nl}

column2: As the villagers started to follow him, he quickly showed his true nature.{nl}He asked us to create a sinister idol and believe in the Divine Tree.{nl}
column3: 마을 사람들이 그를 따르기 시작하자 그는 금새 본성을 드러냈어요.{nl}사악한 우상을 만들고, 신수를 믿으라고 권유하기 시작하더군요.{nl}
column4: Ketika penduduk desa mulai mengikutinya, ia dengan cepat menunjukkan sifat aslinya.{nl} Ia meminta kami untuk membuat sinister idol dan percaya kepada Divine Tree.{nl}

column2: Of course, we resisted... But he locked us into that black wall.{nl}He gave us just enough water to stay alive and tried to convert us to his religion.
column3: 당연히 저희들은 반발했고.. 그는 검은 벽으로 저희를 가둬버렸습니다.{nl}그 이후로 죽지 않을 만큼 물만 주면서 매일 같이 개종을 권유하더군요.{nl}
column4: Tentu saja, kami menolak... Tapi ia mengunci kami ke dalam black wall.{nl}Ia hanya memberi kami cukup air untuk tetap hidup dan mencoba untuk mengubah keyakinan kami.

column2: I felt so painful since I didn't know what to do.{nl}Ah... The abbot!{nl}
column3: 말이 권유지 정말 어떻게 되는 거 아닌가 싶을 정도로 괴로웠다고요.{nl}아.. 수도원장님!{nl}
column4: Aku merasa begitu kesakitan dan aku tidak tahu apa yang harus ku lakukan.{nl} Ah... Kepala biara itu!{nl}

column2: The abbot must be locked inside the monastery.{nl}I was hoping that the goddesses would protect us... {nl}But we will be in trouble if we don't quickly give you the food.
column3: 수도원장님도 수도원 안뜰에 갇혀 계실 거예요.{nl}여신께서 지켜 주시길 기도했지만.. 빨리 식량을 전해 주지 않으면 큰일날 겁니다.
column4: Kepala biara itu pasti terkunci di dalam monastery.{nl} Aku harap para goddess akan melindungi kita semua...{nl}Namun kami akan berada dalam masalah jika kami tidak cepat memberikanmu makanan.

column2: Elgos Abbot
column3: 엘고스 수도원장
column4: Elgos Abbot

column2: This energy... Yes, it's you. The Revelator.{nl}It seems the goddesses finally answered my prayer.{nl}
column3: 이 기운은.. 계시자시군요.{nl}드디어 여신께서 제 기도에 답을 주셨나봅니다.{nl}
column4: Energi ini... Ya, itu kamu. Revelator.{nl}Sepertinya para goddess akhirnya menjawab doa kami.{nl}

column2: Ah, nothing. If the other monks are alright, the food will be okay...{nl}I don't think I'll be able to swallow the food.
column3: 아, 아닙니다. 다른 수도사들만 괜찮다면 식량은 괜찮습니다..{nl}수도원이 이 모양인데.. 먹을 게 넘어가지도 않을 것 같군요.
column4: Ah, tidak. Jika para monk lainnya baik-baik saja, tidak ada masalah dengan makanannya...{nl} Aku rasa aku tidak akan bisa menelan makanan saat ini.

column2: He's too old... Is he going to be alright...?
column3: 연세가 있으신데.. 수도원장님께선 괜찮으실지..
column4: Ia terlalu tua... Apakah ia akan baik-baik saja...?

column2: As expected, Revelator, you're not blocked by the black wall.
column3: 역시 계시자님이셔서 그런지 검은 벽 따위에게 막히지 않으시는군요.{nl}
column4: Seperti dugaan, Revelator, Kamu tidak terhalang oleh black wall.

column2: The sinister idol that was created by Dominikas in front of Pagarba Chapel...{nl}The black wall started to cover the monastery because of that idol.{nl}
column3: 파가르마 예배소 앞에 도미니카스가 만들어 둔 사악한 우상..{nl}그 우상 때문인지 검은 벽이 수도원을 뒤덮기 시작했어요.{nl}
column4: Sinister idol yang telah diciptakan oleh Dominikas berada di depan Pagarba Chapel...{nl} Black Wall mulai mengelilingi monastery karena idol itu.{nl}

column2: If we destroy that sinister idol...{nl}There might be a good chance that the whole wall may disappear.
column3: 아마도 그 사악한 우상을 파괴하면.. {nl}그 벽도 모두 사라지지 않을까 싶습니다.{nl}
column4: Jika kita menghancurkan sinister idol itu...{nl}Ada kemungkinan besar seluruh black wall akan menghilang.

column2: I just don't know how I can destroy it...{nl}There is nothing I can think of at the moment.{nl}
column3: 하지만 그걸 어떻게 파괴해야 할 지..{nl}아무것도 없는 지금은 방법이 생각나질 않는군요.{nl}
column4: Aku hanya tidak tahu bagaimana cara menghancurkannya...{nl} Tidak ada cara yang terpikir olehku saat ini.{nl}

column2: No, wait...{nl}I can sense the demons' souls from you.{nl}
column3: 아니, 그런데 잠깐..{nl}당신에게서 마족의 영혼이 느껴지는군요.{nl}
column4: Tidak, tunggu...{nl} Aku bisa merasakan keberadaan demon soul darimu.{nl}

column2: That sphere you have...{nl}Is a demon's soul locked inside it?{nl}
column3: 당신이 가지고 있는 그 구슬..{nl}그 안에 마족의 영혼이 갇혀있는 건가요?{nl}
column4: Sphere yang kamu miliki...{nl} Apakah demon soul terkunci di dalamnya?{nl}

column2: That's it.{nl}Maybe we can use this to destroy the sinister idol.{nl}
column3: 역시 그랬군요.{nl}어쩌면 이걸 이용해서 사악한 우상을 파괴할 수 있을지도 모르겠습니다.{nl}
column4: Itu dia.{nl}Mungkin kita dapat menggunakan ini untuk menghancurkan sinister idol.{nl}

column2: The idea is to purify the demons' souls and use their power.{nl}Unfortunately, we lack the right amount of souls to destroy the idol.{nl}
column3: 마족의 영혼을 정화해서 그 힘을 이용하자는 것이지요.{nl}하지만 영혼의 양이 우상을 파괴하기엔 조금 부족한 것 같습니다.{nl}
column4: Intinya adalah untuk memurnikan demon soul dan menggunakan kekuatan mereka.{nl} Sayangnya, kita tidak memiliki jumlah soul yang cukup untuk menghancurkan idolnya.{nl}

column2: Can you fill it with a little bit more of the demons' souls?{nl}As you already may know, defeating demons will automatically absorb their souls.
column3: 마족의 영혼을 조금만 더 채워주실 수 없겠습니까.{nl}이미 하셨던 것처럼 마족을 처치하면 영혼이 알아서 흡수될 겁니다.
column4: Dapatkah kamu mengisi dengan demon soul sedikit lebih banyak?{nl} Seperti yang kamu mungkin sudah ketahui, kalahkan para demon maka secara otomatis akan menyerap soul mereka.

column2: Without a doubt the demons are strong... that's why I guess that their souls are strong as well.{nl}My sacred energy is not strong enough to purify this much power.
column3: 역시 강한 마족들이라 그런지.. 영혼 역시 강인한 것 같군요.{nl}이 정도 힘이라면 오히려 제 신성력이 부족하겠습니다.
column4: Sesuai dugaan para demon yang kuat... itu sebabnya aku rasa soul mereka juga kuat.{nl} Energiku tidak cukup kuat untuk memurnikan kekuatan sebesar ini.

column2: We should somehow borrow the power of holy water...{nl}Like I told you before though, I have nothing at the moment.
column3: 아무래도 성수의 힘을 빌려야할 것 같은데.. {nl}아까도 말씀드렸다시피 지금 가지고 있는 것이 아무것도 없습니다.{nl}
column4: Kita harus meminjam kekuatan holy water...{nl} Seperti yang aku katakan sebelumnya, aku tidak memilikinya saat ini.

column2: I am so sorry, but can you get me Holy Water from the Priest Master in Klaipeda?{nl}If we have enough holy water, we'll be able to purify the demons' fallen souls.
column3: 정말 죄송하지만, 클라페다의 프리스트 마스터님께서 성수를 구해주실 수 있겠습니까?{nl}성수만 충분히 있다면 마족의 타락한 영혼을 정화할 수 있을 겁니다.
column4: Maafkan aku, tapi bisakah kamu membawakanku holy water dari Priest Master di Klaipeda?{nl} Jika kita memiliki cukup holy water, kita bisa memurnikan demons' fallen souls.

column2: Please use the statue of Goddess Vakarine near Viyme Fountain.{nl}You can quickly come back from Klaipeda.
column3: 바이메 분수대 근처에 바카리네 여신상을 이용하세요. {nl}빠르게 클라페다까지 갔다 오실 수 있습니다.
column4: Silakan gunakan patung Goddess Vakarine di dekat Viyme Fountain.{nl} Kamu bisa dengan cepat kembali dari Klaipeda.

column2: With this, you'll be able to purify the souls contained within the Soul Sphere.{nl}Now, give me a moment.
column3: 이 정도면 영혼 구슬을 정화할 수 있겠습니다.{nl}잠시만 기다려주세요.
column4: Dengan ini, kamu dapat memurnikan soul yang berada dalam Soul Sphere.{nl}Sekarang, beri aku waktu sesaat.

column2: Since the power of a demon's soul is strong, the residual power after purification possesses strength as well.{nl}This power has the capability to destroy the sinister idol.{nl}
column3: 마족의 영혼이 강력했던 만큼 정화해낸 힘 또한 굉장히 강력하군요.{nl}이 힘이라면 사악한 우상을 충분히 파괴할 수 있을 겁니다.{nl}
column4: Karena kekuatan dari demon soul yang kuat, kekuatan residual setelah pemurnian memiliki kekuatan juga.{nl}Kekuatan ini memiliki kemampuan untuk menghancurkan sinister idol.{nl}

column2: Put the purified Soul Sphere's power into the sinister idol.{nl}I hope the idol can't endure this...
column3: 사악한 우상에 정화된 영혼 구슬의 힘을 흘려넣으세요.{nl}분명 우상이 버티지 못하겠지요..
column4: Letakkan Soul Sphere yang telah dimurnikan ke dalam sinister idol.{nl} Aku harap idol tidak dapat bertahan darinya…

column2: Finally!{nl}Now, we can be freed from the black wall.{nl}
column3: 드디어!{nl}이제야 검은 벽으로부터 자유로워질 수 있겠군요.{nl}
column4: Akhirnya!{nl} Sekarang, kita dapat terbebaskan dari black wall.{nl}

column2: It's been such a long time...{nl}I think my prayer to the goddesses was not in vain...
column3: 도대체 이게 얼마만인지..{nl}여신께 드린 기도가 헛되지 않았나 봅니다..
column4: Sudah sekian lama...{nl} Aku rasa doaku kepada para goddess tidaklah sia-sia…

column2: Now, we'll need to focus on the main culprit of the Order of the Tree of Truth, Dominikas...{nl}Everything will be over once we drive him out.{nl}
column3: 이제 남은 원흉은 진리의 나무 교단의 사제인 도미니카스..{nl}그를 몰아내야 모든 것이 끝날 것입니다.{nl}
column4: Sekarang, kita harus fokus pada biang kerok dari Order of the Tree of Truth, Dominikas...{nl}Semuanya akan selesai setelah kita menyingkirkannya.{nl}

column2: Please lend me your power a little longer.{nl}Even if we have the methods to catch him, we can't use our powers {nl}since the villagers have been possessed from being tortured so long...{nl}
column3: 조금만 더 당신의 힘을 빌려주세요.{nl}그를 잡을 방법이 있어도 마을 사람들은 전부 현혹된데다가 오랜 고문으로 저희는 힘을 쓸 수 없습니다..
column4: Tolong pinjamkan kekuatanmu sedikit lebih lagi.{nl}Bahkan jika kami memiliki metode untuk menangkapnya, kami tidak bisa menggunakan kekuatan kami{nl}karena penduduk desa telah disiksa begitu lama...{nl}

column2: He seems to have some sort of power that allows him to control plants.{nl}I sincerely warn you that he is not to be underestimated.
column3: 그는 식물을 자유자재로 다루는 힘을 지닌 것 같습니다.{nl}만만히 볼 상대가 아니니 부디 조심하세요.
column4: Ia tampaknya memiliki semacam kekuatan yang memungkinkannya untuk mengontrol tanaman.{nl}Saya ingin memperingatkanku jangan anggap ia remeh.

column2: Dominikas... He ran away...{nl}
column3: 도미니카스는 도망쳐버렸습니까..{nl}
column4: Dominikas... Ia lari...{nl}

column2: We shouldn't worry too much.{nl}It's a big blow that we drove out the Order of the Tree of Truth from the Elgos Monastery.{nl}
column3: 하지만 괜찮습니다.{nl}엘고스 수도원에서 진리의 나무 교단을 몰아낸 것 만으로도 큰 수확이 아니겠습니까.{nl}
column4: Kita tidak perlu terlalu khawatir.{nl}Itu adalah pukulan besar ketika kami menyingkirkan Order of the Tree of Truth dari Elgos Monastery.{nl}

column2: And the monsters instead of plants' explosion, I guess it stopped since the spell was unstable.{nl}We were able to protect the villagers because of you.{nl}
column3: 게다가 식물 폭주 대신 몬스터라니, 주술이 불완전했기에 그 정도로 그친 것 같군요.{nl}당신 덕분에 마을 사람들을 지킬 수 있었어요.{nl}
column4: Dan para monster tanaman meledak, saya kira itu berhenti karena spell itu tidak stabil.{nl}Kami bisa melindungi para penduduk desa karenamu.{nl}

column2: When we get better, we will clean up the monastery.{nl}Of course, we should drive out the demons as well.{nl}
column3: 저희도 몸이 나아지면 바로 수도원을 정리해야겠습니다.{nl}물론 마족도 몰아내야겠지요.{nl}
column4: Ketika kami kembali pulih, kami akan membersihkan monastery.{nl}Tentu saja, kita harus menyingkirkan para demon keluar juga.{nl}

column2: Even if the world collapses, we believe in people like you who give hope...{nl}You give us the power to endure.{nl}
column3: 세상이 비록 전부 부서지고 저런 사교가 날뛰어도 당신이라는 희망이.. {nl}버틸 수 있게 해주는 힘을 주는 것 같습니다.{nl}
column4: Bahkan jika dunia runtuh, kami mempercayai orang sepertimu, seseorang yang memberi harapan...{nl} Kamu memberi kami kekuatan untuk bertahan.{nl}

column2: I don't want to imagine what would've happened without you...{nl}On behalf of the whole monastery, we greatly appreciate your help.
column3: 정말 당신이 없었으면 어떻게 되었을지.. {nl}정말.. 수도원을 대표해서 감사했습니다.
column4: Aku tidak bisa membayangkan apa yang akan terjadi tanpamu...{nl} Atas nama seluruh monastery, kami sangat menghargai bantuanmu.

column2: You've done it!{nl}The black wall disappeared...{nl}
column3: 결국 해내셨군요!{nl}어쩐지 검은 벽이 사라지더라니..{nl}
column4: Kamu telah melakukannya dengan baik!{nl} Black wall menghilang...{nl}

column2: Thank you for saving the monastery.{nl}Ah, is the abbot alright?{nl}
column3: 수도원을 구해주셔서 정말 감사했습니다.{nl}아, 수도원장님께선 괜찮으시던가요?{nl}
column4: Terima kasih karena telah menyelamatkan monastery.{nl}Ah, apakah kepala biara baik-baik saja?{nl}

column2: ...So that is it. {nl}Your faith is as strong as I imagined.
column3: ..그렇군요. {nl}역시 신심이 굳건하신 분이세요.
column4: ...Jadi begitu.{nl}Keyakinanmu sangat kuat seperti yang kuduga.

column2: Good! Anything. {nl}Just tell me what I can do for you.{nl}
column3: 그럼요! 무슨 일이든지요. {nl}제가 도울 수 있는 일이라면 말씀만 하세요.{nl}
column4: Baik! Apa pun itu.{nl} Katakan saja apa yang bisa aku lakukan untukmu.{nl}

column2: What? {nl}So the villagers think we ran away after abandoning the monastery?{nl}
column3: 네? {nl}마을 주민들은 저희가 수도원을 버리고 도망간 줄 알고 있다고요?{nl}
column4: Apa?{nl}Jadi para penduduk desa berpikir kami melari diri setelah meninggalkan monastery?{nl}

column2: Those people at the Order of the Tree of Truth... {nl}They locked others inside and alienated them...{nl}
column3: 진리의 나무 교단 녀석들.. {nl}사람을 가둔 것도 모자라서 이간질까지 시키다니..{nl}
column4: Orang-orang di Order of the Tree of Truth...{nl} Mereka mengunci yang lain di dalamnya dan mengasingkan mereka...{nl}

column2: Can you go to the villagers with me?{nl}If you are with me, all misunderstandings will be solved.
column3: 저랑 같이 마을 주민들에게 가 주실 수 있을까요?{nl}당신만 곁에 있어 준다면 오해도 다 풀릴 겁니다.
column4: Dapatkah kamu pergi menemui penduduk desa denganku?{nl}Jika kamu denganku, semua kesalahpahaman ini akan terpecahkan.

column2: Hmm... It seems that the villagers found out the true identity of Dominikas.{nl}It is fortunate that the task was solved easier than expected...{nl}
column3: 음.. 이미 마을 사람들도 도미니카스의 정체를 알아버린 것 같네요.{nl}다행이에요. 생각보다 일이 쉽게 풀려서..{nl}
column4: Hmm... Tampaknya para penduduk desa menemukan telah mengetahu identitas sebenarnya dari Dominikas.{nl} Sungguh beruntung tugas ini bisa diselesaikan dengan mudah lebih dari yang diduga... {nl}

column2: I will send the villagers back to the village.{nl}I really appreciate that you've reclaimed the Elgos Monastery from the Order of the Tree of Truth.
column3: 마을 사람들은 제가 일단 마을로 돌려 보내겠습니다.{nl}엘고스 수도원을 진리의 나무 교단으로부터 되찾아주셔서 다시 한번 감사드립니다.
column4: Aku akan mengirim penduduk desa kembali ke desa.{nl} Aku sangat berterima kasih karena kamu telah merebut kembali Elgos Monastery dari Order of the Tree of Truth.

column2: The demons here are very strong. {nl}Be careful.
column3: 이 곳의 마족들은 아주 강합니다.{nl}부디 몸 조심 하십시오.
column4: Para demon di sini sangat kuat.{nl} Berhati-hatilah.

column2: Don't underestimate the power of the sinister idol.{nl}Be careful.
column3: 사악한 우상의 힘을 얕봐선 안됩니다.{nl}부디 조심히 다녀오세요.
column4: Jangan meremehkan kekuatan dari sinister idol.{nl} Berhati-hatilah.

column2: Now, the Revelator will continue the journey by following the will of the goddesses.{nl}But before you leave, can you do me one more favor for this old man?{nl}
column3: 이제 계시자님께서는 여신의 뜻에 따라 여정을 계속하시겠군요.{nl}떠나시기 전에 이 늙은이의 부탁을 하나만 더 들어주실 수 있겠습니까.{nl}
column4: Sekarang, Revelator akan melanjutkan perjalanan mengikuti kehendak para goddess.{nl} Tapi sebelum kamu pergi, bisakah kamu melakukan satu permintaan dari orang tua ini?{nl}

column2: Although we got rid of the Order of the Tree of Truth...{nl}The evil demons still prevail.{nl}
column3: 진리의 나무 교단은 전부 뿌리뽑았지만..{nl}여전히 사악한 마족이 신성한 수도원을 활개치고 다니고 있습니다.{nl}
column4: Meskipun kita telah menyingkirkan Order of the Tree of Truth...{nl} Para evil demon masih berkeliaran.{nl}

column2: If you lend me your power, we'll be able to drive out the demons much faster.{nl}Can you defeat the demons here?{nl}
column3: 계시자님께서 힘을 빌려주시면 수도원에서 마족들을 더 빨리 몰아낼 수 있을 것 같습니다.{nl}이 곳의 마족을 처치해주실 수 있겠습니까?{nl}
column4: Jika kamu meminjamkan kekuatanmu padaku, kami akan bisa menyingkirkan para demon dengan lebih cepat.{nl}Bisakah kamu mengalahkan para demon di sini?{nl}

column2: There is something that is bothering me.{nl}I think driving out the Order of the Tree of Truth was wonderful, but...
column3: 마음에 걸리는 게 있습니다.{nl}진리의 나무 교단을 몰아낸 건 정말 다행이라고 생각합니다만..{nl}
column4: Ada sesuatu yang membuatku khawatir.{nl} Aku merasa menyingkirkan Order of the Tree of Truth itu sangat mengagumkan, tetapi…

column2: Dominikas ran away.{nl}I think he may come back by leading the Order of the Tree of Truth...{nl}
column3: 도망친 도미니카스 말입니다.{nl}진리의 나무 교단을 이끌고 돌아올지도 모르겠다.. 라는 생각이 들더군요.{nl}
column4: Dominikas melarikan diri.{nl}Aku rasa ia mungkin akan kembali dengan memimpin  Order of the Tree of Truth...{nl}

column2: I want to prepare something for this...{nl}Can you help me?
column3: 여기에 대해 대비해두고 싶은데.. {nl}계시자님께서 도와주실 순 없겠습니까?
column4: Saya ingin mempersiapkan sesuatu untuk hal ini... {nl} Bisakah kamu membantuku?

column2: If Dominikas comes back again...{nl}Then, I will not stand idly by.
column3: 만약 도미니카스가 다시 또 돌아온다면..{nl}그땐 가만히 당하고만 있진 않을 겁니다.
column4: Jika Dominikas datang kembali...{nl} Maka, aku tidak akan berpangku tangan.

column2: Thank you. {nl}I can relax now because of you.
column3: 감사합니다. {nl}계시자님 덕분에 마음이 놓입니다.
column4: Terima kasih.{nl}Aku bisa sedikit tenang sekarang karenamu.

column2: Good. You should do it.{nl}I was actually going to Veyrhas Hall to burn the scripture...{nl}
column3: 그럼요. 당연히 그래야지요.{nl}안 그래도 지금 막 베이라스 홀로 경전을 태우러 가려는 참인데..{nl}
column4: Bagus. Kamu harus melakukannya.{nl}Aku sebenarnya ingin pergi ke Veyrhas Hall untuk membakar scripture... {nl}

column2: It's better to see it once than to hear it a hundred times.{nl}Let's go together. Brother.
column3: 백 번 듣는 것보다 한 번 보는 게 낫지 않겠습니까?{nl}함께 가 보시죠, 형제님.
column4: Lebih baik melihatnya sekali daripada mendengarkannya seratus kali.{nl}Mari kita pergi bersama-sama. Saudaraku.

column2: I didn't know that one of people of the Winterspoon family came to Nahash Forest.{nl}Even so, since you know this person, he or she must be reliable.{nl}I'm counting on you.
column3: 나하스 숲에 마침 윈터스푼 가문의 사람이 와 계신다니 그건 몰랐어요.{nl}그래도 계시자님께서 알고 계신다니 분명 믿을 만한 사람일테죠.{nl}잘 부탁드리겠습니다.
column4: Aku tidak tahu bila salah satu orang dari Winterspoon family datang ke Nahas Forest.{nl} Meski begitu, karena kamu mengetahui orang ini, ia pasti bisa diandalkan.{nl} Aku mengandalkanmu.

column2: I can't exactly remember what I did back then.{nl}It's as if I was possessed by something...{nl}
column3: 사실 그때 정확히 무슨 짓을 했는지 기억이 잘 안나요.{nl}마치 무언가에 홀린 것처럼.. {nl}
column4: Aku tidak ingat persis apa yang saya lakukan pada saat itu.{nl} Seolah-olah aku dirasuki oleh sesuatu... {nl}

column2: Yes! {nl}I wouldn't have done such a disrespectful act with a conscious mind.
column3: 그래요! {nl}제정신으로 제가 그런 불경스러운 일을 할 리가 없잖아요?
column4: Iya!{nl}Aku tidak akan melakukan tindakan yang tidak sopan seperti itu dengan penuh kesadaran.

column2: I will apologize to the other monks later.{nl}I can't believe what I did.{nl}
column3: 수도사님들껜 나중에 따로 사과드려야겠어요.{nl}제가 저지른 일이 정말 믿어지지가 않아요.{nl}
column4: Aku akan meminta maaf kepada para monk lain nanti.{nl} Aku tidak percaya dengan apa yang telah aku lakukan.{nl}

column2: Look around you.{nl}Don't you think it's beautiful?{nl}
column3: 주위를 둘러보게. {nl}정말 아름답지 않은가?{nl}
column4: Lihatlah di sekitarmu.{nl}Tidakkah kau merasa itu indah?{nl}

column2: The red blood of demons contain special powers.{nl}That's why only their blood can wash away the corrupted power of the goddess.
column3: 마족의 붉은 피에는 특별한 힘이 담겨 있지.{nl}그래서 마족의 붉은 피만이 여신의 오염된 힘을 씻어낼 수 있다네.
column4: The red blood of demons memiliki special power.{nl}Oleh sebab itu hanya darah mereka yang bisa membersihkan the corrupted power of the goddess.

column2: The Order of the Tree of Truth turned the monastery into a complete mess...
column3: 진리의 나무 교단이 수도원을 난장판으로 만들어 놨네요..
column4: The Order of the Tree of Truth membuat monastery menjadi berantakan...

column2: We have to clean up the blood of the demons and tidy up the scripture...{nl}We have many things to do.
column3: 마족의 피도 닦아내야 하고 경전도 정리해야하고..{nl}할 일이 많아요.
column4: Kita harus membersihkan the blood of the demons dan membersihkan the scripture...{nl}Banyak hal yang harus kita kerjakan.

column2: It will be effective!{nl}Even so... If it goes wrong, you should tell me... For sure...
column3: 효과는 확실할거야!{nl}그래도.. 혹시 잘못되면 꼭 말해줘야해.. 꼭..
column4: Ini akan efektif!{nl}Namun... Jika ada yang salah, kamu harus memberitahuku... OK...

column2: Revelator, I am eternally thankful to you.
column3: 계시자님에 대해선 정말 감사히 생각하고 있습니다.
column4: Revelator, Aku berterima kasih kepadamu.

column2: Dominikas opened my eyes to a new light.{nl}Only the Divine Tree can save us...
column3: 저는 도미니카스님 덕분에 새로이 눈을 떴습니다.{nl}신수만이 우릴 구원해주실 거예요..
column4: Dominikas membuka mataku pada cahaya baru.{nl}Hanya Divine Tree yang bisa menyelamatkan kita...

column2: I need to save my power since we don't know when {nl}the Order of the Tree of Truth will attack the monastery again.{nl}I really thank you.
column3: 언제 진리의 나무 교단이 다시 수도원에 들이닥칠지 모르니 힘을 비축해둬야겠습니다.{nl}계시자님껜 정말 감사할 따름이지요.
column4: Aku harus menghemat kekuatan, karena kita tidak tau kapan {nl}Order of the Tree of Truth akan menyerang monastery lagi.{nl}Aku sangat bertrima kasih.

column2: How could we lose the monastery to a heresy like the Order of the Tree of Truth...{nl}I am sorry to the goddess and I am thankful to her.
column3: 진리의 나무 교단같은 이단에게 수도원을 빼앗기다니..{nl}여신께 죄송하고 또 감사할 따름입니다.
column4: Bagaimana kita bisa kehilangan monastery oleh Order of the Tree of Truth...{nl}Aku meminta maaf pada goddess dan bersyukur padanya.

column2: I won't be deceived by the lies of the goddess anymore.{nl}You also think so, right?
column3: 더 이상 여신의 새빨간 거짓말에 현혹되지 않을 거예요.{nl}형제님께서도 그렇게 생각하시지요?
column4: Aku tidak akan tertipu oleh kebohongan goddess lagi.{nl}Kamu juga berfikir begitu kan ?

column2: You really are...{nl}You might be the envoy that was sent by the goddess...{nl}
column3: 정말 당신은.. {nl}여신께서 보낸 사자임이 틀림없을지도 모르겠군요..{nl}
column4: Kamu benar-benar...{nl}Kamu mungkin utusan yang dikirim oleh goddess...{nl}

column2: What's strange is that Dominikas often visited Pagarba Chapel.{nl}It could very well mean that he may have hidden something important there.{nl}
column3: 도미니카스는 이상할 정도로 파가르마 예배소를 자주 들렀습니다.{nl}아마 그 곳에 뭔가 중요한 것을 숨겨두었는지도 모르지요.{nl}
column4: Yang aneh Dominikas sering mengunjungi Pagarba Chapel.{nl}Mungkin dia telah menyembunyikan sesuatu yang penting disana.{nl}

column2: If you hide there, you will definitely manage to ambush Dominikas.{nl}I will pray for you in the name of the goddess.
column3: 그곳에 매복해 있으면 반드시 도미니카스를 붙잡을 수 있을 겁니다.{nl}여신의 이름으로 무운을 빌겠습니다..
column4: Jika kamu bersembunyi disana, kamu bisa menyergap Dominikas.{nl}Aku akan berdoa untukmu dalam nama goddess.

column2: As we cleaned up the monastery...{nl}I found a bunch of the Soul Spheres that were left by Dominikas.{nl}
column3: 수도원을 정리하다 보니.. {nl}도미니카스가 남겨 놓고 간 영혼 구슬이 잔뜩 남아 있더군요.{nl}
column4: Ketika sedang membersihkan monastery...{nl}Aku menemukan Soul Spheres yang ditingalkan oleh Dominikas.{nl}

column2: Can you remember when you broke the sinister idol?{nl}How about I put the demon souls into the sphere and purify them.{nl}
column3: 사악한 우상을 부술 때 기억나십니까?{nl}미리 구슬에 마족의 영혼을 채워 놓고 정화해놓으면 어떨까 싶습니다.{nl}
column4: Bisakah kamu ingat ketika kamu memecahkan the sinister idol?{nl}Bagaimana jika aku menaruh demon souls ke sphere dan memurnikan mereka.{nl}

column2: I will give you the Soul Sphere if you could defeat the demons with these, please.{nl}You can put the souls into this sphere.
column3: 영혼 구슬을 나누어 드릴 테니 이걸 가지고 마족을 처치해 주십시오.{nl}구슬에 마족의 영혼만 채워 주시면 되겠습니다.
column4: Aku akan berikan Soul Sphere jika kamu bisa mengalahkan demon dengan ini, silakan.{nl}Kamu bisa meletakan the souls ke sphere ini.

column2: One day, I will become the Alchemist Master!
column3: 언젠간 꼭 알케미스트 마스터가 되고 말거야!
column4: Suatu hari , aku akan menjadi Alchemist Master!

column2: I'll receive help from Vaidotas until I become the Alchemist Master.{nl}It's not because I lost to Vaidotas, it's just that I'm trying to use him!{nl}
column3: 알케미스트 마스터가 될 때까지 바이도타스의 도움은 적극적으로 받아야겠어.{nl}이건 바이도타스에게 져서 그런 게 아니라 그를 이용하려는거야!{nl}
column4: Aku mendapatkan bantuan dari Vaidotas sampai aku menjadi Alchemist Master.{nl}Ini bukan berarti aku kalah dengan Vaidotas, hanya saja aku ingin mengunakan nya saja!{nl}

column2: Really!!
column3: 정말이야!!
column4: Masa!!

column2: I sense something strange in the villagers. As he said, let's help the villagers.
column3: 마을 주민에게서 이상한 느낌이 든다. 일단 그의 말 대로 주민들을 도와 보자.
column4: Aku merasakan hal yang aneh pada penduduk desa. Saat ia mengatakan, mari kita membantu penduduk desa.

column2: Believe in the Divine Tree and let it save you.{nl}The door of the Order of the Tree of Truth is always open.
column3: 신수를 믿고 구원받으십시오.{nl}저희 진리의 나무 교단은 언제나 활짝 열려있습니다.
column4: Percaya pada the Divine Tree dan biarkan dia menyelamatkan mu.{nl}Pintu Order of the Tree of Truth selalu terbuka.

column2: Fake goddesses, untruthful doctrines... Are you sure that your belief in them has become quite strong?{nl}But that's the wrong path to salvation.{nl}
column3: 거짓된 여신, 거짓된 교리.. 당신도 여신에 대한 믿음이 굳건하시겠지요?{nl}하지만 그것은 잘못된 구원입니다.{nl}
column4: Goddesses palsu, doktrin yang tidak benar... Apakah kamu yakin kepercayaan mu pada nya mencadi cukup kuat?{nl}Namun itu jalan yang salah dalam keselamatan.{nl}

column2: Tell me when you are ready.
column3: 준비되면 얘기해줘.
column4: Beritahu jika kamu telah siap.

column2: I regret that I may have done something wrong due to hunger.{nl}If Dominikas came instead of you... we wouldn't have been able to go back...
column3: 제가 배고픔에 눈이 멀어 넘어갈 뻔 했던 걸 후회하고 있습니다.{nl}계시자님이 오신 게 아니라 도미니카스였으면.. 다신 돌이킬 수 없었겠지요.
column4: Aku menyesal mungkin aku telah melakukan sesuatu yang salah karena kelaparan.{nl}Jika Dominikas yang datang bukan kamu... Kita tidak akan mampu untuk kembali...

column2: I am worried about the abbot.{nl}He is old... I hope the goddesses take care of him...
column3: 수도원장님이 제일 걱정이네요.{nl}연세가 있으신지라.. 여신께서 부디 돌봐주시길..
column4: Aku khawatir mengenai abbot.{nl}Dia Tua... Aku harap goddesses akan melindungi nya...

column2: You are unable to move due to a strange magic circle!
column3: 이상한 마법진 때문에 움직일 수가 없다!
column4: Kamu tidak bisa bergerak karena terkena strange magic circle!

column2: It looks like the circle was made for something evil.{nl}Let's see if there's other circles around.
column3: 누군가 나쁜 의도로 마법진을 그려놓은 것 같다. {nl}혹시 다른 마법진은 없는지 찾아보자.
column4: Tampaknya lingkaran tersebut dibuat untuk tujuan jahat.{nl}Coba kita liat apakah ada lagi lingkaran di sekitar.

column2: I found another magic circle.{nl}I wonder if it'll disappear if we destroy the magic core?
column3: 다른 마법진을 찾았다. {nl}마법진 가운데의 마력핵을 부수면 마법진이 사라지지 않을까?
column4: Aku menemukan magic circle lainya.{nl}Apakah akan menghilang jika kita menghancurkan the magic core?

column2: I don't think regular stones will work.{nl}Maybe monster horns or something similar?
column3: 평범한 돌맹이는 소용이 없는 것 같다. {nl}혹시 몬스터의 뿔이라면 효과가 있지 않을까?
column4: Aku tidak berfikir bisa bekerja pada batu biasa.{nl}Mungkin monster horns atau sesuatu yang serupa?

column2: I think I found out how to destroy the magic circles.{nl}Let's see if there's more of them.
column3: 마법진을 파괴할 방법을 알아낸 것 같다. {nl}또 다른 마법진을 찾아봐야겠다.
column4: Aku rasa aku menemukan cara untuk menghancurkan the magic circles.{nl}Mari kita lihat apakah masih ada lagi.

column2: Are you hurt?{nl}I'm sorry. I didn't think someone would come to such unstable grounds.
column3: 어디 다치신데는 없습니까?{nl}죄송합니다. 이렇게 불안정한 땅에 사람이 올 줄은 몰랐습니다.
column4: Kamu terluka?{nl}Aku minta maaf. Aku tidak berfikir seseorang akan datang ke tanah yang tidak stabil.

column2: I'm Kabbalist Lutas.{nl}I'm redrawing the Vera Coast magic circles as requested by the Kabbalist Master.{nl}
column3: 저는 카발리스트 루타스라고 합니다.{nl}카발리스트 마스터님의 지시로 베라 연안의 마법진을 다시 그리고 있죠.{nl}
column4: Aku Kabbalist Lutas.{nl}Aku menggambar the Vera Coast magic circles seperti permintaan Kabbalist Master.{nl}

column2: This area rose up from underwater during Medzio Diena, so the soil here is very weak. {nl}If it ends up being covered by the sea again, it will cause {nl}a massive earthquake affecting the whole continent.{nl}
column3: 여긴 신수의 날 때문에 바다에서 떠오른 곳이라 지반이 많이 약하거든요.{nl}혹시나 이 곳이 다시 바다로 가라앉게 되면 그 여파로 대지진이 대륙을 덮칠 겁니다.{nl}
column4: Area ini timbul dari bawah air semasa Medzio Diena, oleh sebab itu tanah nya sangat lemah. {nl}Jika tergenang oleh air laut kembali, akan menyebabkan  {nl}gempa besar yang mempengaruhi seluruh benua.{nl}

column2: Because of that, the Kabbalist Master drew magic circles here to stabilize the soil.{nl}With the power of Zemyna, the goddess of the earth and Jurate, the goddess of the sea.{nl}
column3: 그것 때문에 카발리스트 마스터께서 이 곳의 지반을 안정시킬 마법진을 그리셨지요.{nl}대지의 여신 제미나의 힘과 바다의 여신 유라테의 힘을 빌어서요.{nl}
column4: Oleh karena itu, the Kabbalist Master mengambar magic circles disini untuk menstabilikan tanah.{nl}Dengan kekuatan Zemyna, goddess bumi dan Jurate,  goddess dari lautan.{nl}

column2: But after sometime, I came back and the circles had faded a lot.{nl}So I told the Kabbalist Master and now I'm redrawing the magic circles.{nl}
column3: 그런데 다시 와 보니 시간이 지나서 그런가.. 마법진이 많이 약해져 있더라고요.{nl}그래서 카발리스트 마스터님께 보고를 드리고 마법진을 다시 그리고 있습니다.{nl}
column4: Tapi setelah beberapa waktu, aku kembali dan the magic circles telah banyak memudar.{nl}Jadi aku beritahu Kabbalist Master dan sekarang aku menggambar ulang the magic circles.{nl}

column2: By the way, you don't seem very affected by the Binding Magic Circle, you must be skilled. {nl}Sorry for asking, but I could use some help, actually... Would you perhaps...?
column3: 그나저나 그 구속 마법진의 영향을 거의 안 받으신 걸 보니 실력이 상당하신가 보네요.{nl}마법진 일로 염치없지만, 도움을 조금 빌렸으면 하는데.. 어떻게 안될까요?
column4: Ngomong - ngomong, kamu tampak nya tidak terlalu terpengaruh oleh Binding Magic Circle, kamu pasti punya skill. {nl}Maaf untuk bertanya, tapi aku butuh bantuan sebenar nya…apakah kamu mungkin...?

column2: Oh no... How could this happen?{nl}The Earth Magic Circle is gone!{nl}
column3: 아니.. 어떻게 이럴 수가 있죠?{nl}대지의 마법진이 사라졌어요!{nl}
column4: Oh no... Bagaimana ini bisa terjadi?{nl}Earth Magic Circle menghilang!{nl}

column2: Could it be... the earthquake...
column3: 설마.. 아까 그 지진이..
column4: Mungkinkan... Gempa Bumi...

column2: You destroyed the magic core?{nl}Oh my...{nl}
column3: 그 쪽이 마법진의 핵을 부숴버렸다고요?{nl}맙소사..{nl}
column4: Kamu menghancurkan the magic core?{nl}Oh my...{nl}

column2: I know my magic circles gave you a hard time, but this one...{nl}This one is the magic circle supporting Vera Coast!{nl}
column3: 제 마법진 때문에 고생하신 건 알겠지만, 이 마법진은..{nl}베라 연안을 지탱해주는 마법진이라고요!{nl}
column4: Aku tau magic circles ku membuatmu susah, tapi yang ini...{nl}Ini adalah the magic circle yang mensuport Vera Coast!{nl}

column2: We can't lose time. We need to draw the magic circle again!{nl}Quick, you need to gather some earth energy.
column3: 이럴 시간이 없어요. 당장 마법진을 다시 그려야해요!{nl}빨리 대지의 기운을 모아 주셔야겠어요.{nl}
column4: Kita tidak bisa kehilangan waktu. Kita perlu menggambar the magic circle lagi!{nl}Cepat, kamu perlu mengumpulkan beberapa earth energy.

column2: I have an earth energy collector that I installed some time ago, just in case.{nl}The Tuolo Coral Reef. I'll give you this Earth Magic Stone, just go quickly.
column3: 혹시 몰라서 제가 예전에 대지의 기운을 모으는 수집기를 설치해 놨어요.{nl}투올로 산호초에요. 대지의 마법석을 드릴 테니 빠르게 부탁드릴게요.
column4: Aku memiliki earth energy collector yang ku pasang beberapa waktu lalu, untuk berjaga-jaga.{nl}The Tuolo Coral Reef. Aku berikan kamu Earth Magic Stone, cepatlah pergi.

column2: We have no time to stall.{nl}If we don't complete the magic circle, we could cause an earthquake as strong as Medzio Diena!{nl}
column3: 여기서 잡담이나 나눌 시간이 없어요.{nl}마법진을 다시 완성하지 못한다면 신수의 날 급 대지진이 다시 올지도 모른다고요!{nl}
column4: Kita tidak punya waktu.{nl}Jika kita tidak menyelesaikan the magic circle, kita bisa menyebabkan gempa bumi sekuat Medzio Diena!{nl}

column2: Aaargh... Another earthquake...{nl}
column3: 으아아.. 또 지진이..{nl}
column4: Aaargh... Gempa bumi lagi...{nl}

column2: You're fast.{nl}Give me the earth energy. I'll take it from here.
column3: 생각보다 일찍 오셨네요. {nl}대지의 기운은 제게 주세요. 이 쪽은 제가 맡을게요.
column4: Kamu sangat cepat.{nl}Berikan aku earth energy. Kutangani dari sini.

column2: Did you feel the ground shaking earlier? We need to hurry.{nl}After restoring the Earth Magic Circle, I'm going to take care of the the sea and balancing one.{nl}
column3: 아까 지진 느끼셨죠? 지체할 시간이 없어요.{nl}대지의 마법진을 복구하변 바로 바다의 마법진과 조화의 마법진을 복구할 겁니다.{nl}
column4: Apakah kamu merasakan tanah bergetar sebelum nya? Kita harus bergegas.{nl}Setelah memperbaiki the Earth Magic Circle, saya akan menangani laut dan balancing one.{nl}

column2: I'm giving you a Sea Magic Stone and a balancing one.{nl}Fill them up while I try to restore the Earth Magic Circle.{nl}
column3: 바다의 마법석과 조화의 마법석을 드릴게요.{nl}제가 대지의 마법진을 복구시키는 동안 이 두 마법석을 가득 채워 주셔야 해요.{nl}
column4: Aku berikan Sea Magic Stone dan balancing one.{nl}Isi mereka sementara aku memulihkan the Earth Magic Circle.{nl}

column2: Unfortunately I have no collector for these.{nl}You'll have to put down the stones and hunt monsters nearby to have them absorb their energy.{nl}
column3: 아쉽게도 수집기가 없어서 아까처럼은 안 돼요.{nl}마법석을 놓고 그 주변에서 몬스터를 처치하면 몬스터의 기운을 마법석이 흡수할 거예요.{nl}
column4: Sayangnya aku tidak memiliki collector untuk ini.{nl}Kamu harus meletakan batu itu dan berburu monster disekitar agar energi nya terserap.{nl}

column2: The ground was shaking again.{nl}I should hurry and complete the Sea Magic Circle.
column3: 또 다시 땅이 흔들렸다. {nl}서둘러서 바다의 마법석을 채워야할 것 같다.
column4: Tanah bergetar lagi.{nl}Aku harus cepat menyelesaikan the Sea Magic Circle.

column2: Did you fill up the stones with energy?{nl}
column3: 마법석에 기운은 모두 채워오셨나요?{nl}
column4: Apakah kamu mengsi batu dengan energy?{nl}

column2: I just finished the magic circle.{nl}Please wait a moment.
column3: 저도 이제 막 마법진을 완성했어요.{nl}잠시만 기다려주세요.
column4: Aku telah menyelesaikan the magic circle.{nl}Silakan tunggu sebentar.

column2: Finished! Now to repair the Sea Magic Circle.{nl}I'll go ahead first and start preparing.{nl}
column3: 됐어요! 바로 바다의 마법진을 복구하러 움직이죠.{nl}제가 먼저 가서 준비 작업을 하고 있을게요.{nl}
column4: Selesai! Sekarang perbaiki the Sea Magic Circle.{nl}Aku akan pergi dulu dan mulai mempersiapkan.{nl}

column2: The Sea Magic Circle is in Khanka Sentry.{nl}You know where it is, right? We'll meet there.
column3: 바다의 마법진은 칸카 보초에 있어요.{nl}가 보신 적이 있으실 테니까 찾아오실 수 있으시죠?
column4: Sea Magic Circle ada di Khanka Sentry.{nl}Kamu tau tempatnya kan? Kita akan bertemu disana.

column2: Thanks to you I was able to draw the circle in time.{nl}Now I just need to finish the Balancing Magic Circle and it should be fine.
column3: 감사합니다. 덕분에 빨리 마법진을 그릴 수 있었어요.{nl}이제 조화의 마법진만 완성시키면 안심해도 될 것 같아요.
column4: Berkat kamu saya berhasil menggambar lingkaran tepat waktu.{nl}Sekarang aku hanya perlu menyelesaikan Balancing Magic Circle dan semuanya akan baik-baik saja

column2: I drew the Balancing Magic Circle in advance before coming back.{nl}All we need to do is add the balancing energy to it.{nl}
column3: 조화의 마법진은 여기 오기 전에 제가 미리 그려놨어요.{nl}그려놓은 마법진에 조화의 기운만 불어넣으면 되지요.{nl}
column4: Aku menggambar Balancing Magic Circle terlebih dahulu sebelum datang kembali.{nl}Yang kita perlukan adalam menambahkan the balancing energy.{nl}

column2: The Balancing Magic Circle is at the Garama Sandbank, past the Bachl Vacant Lot.{nl}Let's go.
column3: 조화의 마법진은 바흘 공터를 지나서 가라마 모래톱에 있습니다.{nl}함께 가시죠.
column4: Balancing Magic Circle ada di Garama Sandbank, lewat the Bachl Vacant Lot.{nl}Kemon.

column2: Ugh... I can't walk anymore.{nl}I'm sorry, I'm a disgrace...
column3: 윽.. 더 이상 걷는 건 무리에요.{nl}꼴사나운 모습을 보였네요..
column4: Ugh... Aku gakuat berjalan lagi.{nl}Maaf, aku memalukan…

column2: But there's no time to waste.{nl}The Balancing Magic Circle needs to be completed as soon as possible...{nl}
column3: 이렇게 한가로이 보낼 시간은 없어요.{nl}한시라도 빨리 조화의 마법진을 완성해야 하는데..{nl}
column4: Tapi tidak ada waktu lagi.{nl}Balancing Magic Circle harus selesai secepatny...{nl}

column2: I think I'm going to have to give you the balancing stone.{nl}I'll be fine if I rest for a while, you go ahead and complete the magic circle. Please.
column3: 어쩔 수 없죠. 조화의 마법석을 드릴게요. {nl}저는 조금 쉬면 괜찮아질테니까 어서 가서 마법진을 완성시켜 주세요. 어서요.
column4: Aku pikir aku akan berikan the balancing stone kepadamu.{nl}Aku akan membaik jika beristirahat sebentar, tolong selesaikan the magic circle.

column2: We're wasting time. Go now. Go...
column3: 시간을 너무 지체했어요. 어서 가요. 어서..
column4: Kita membuang-buang waktu.Pergi sekarang. Go...

column2: You did great.{nl}You stopped an immense tragedy from happening.{nl}
column3: 정말 잘 해주셨어요.{nl}당신이 큰 재앙을 막아 주신 거예요.{nl}
column4: Kerja bagus.{nl}Kamu barusaja menghentikan tragedi besar.{nl}

column2: Vera Coast should be safe from being submerged now.{nl}I'm going to look into the conditions of the soil a little more and go back to the Kabbalist Master.{nl}Thank you for your help.
column3: 이제 한 동안 베라 연안이 가라앉을 일은 없을 겁니다.{nl}저는 베라 연안 상태를 조금 더 살펴보고 카발리스트 마스터께 돌아가려고요.{nl}그 동안 도와주셔서 정말 감사했습니다.
column4: Vera Coast telah aman dan tidak akan tenggelam.{nl}Aku akan melihat kondisi tanah nya lagi dan kembali ke Kabbalist Master.{nl}Terimakasih atas bantuan mu.

column2: Thank you!{nl}Now if only you'll keep the monsters away while I draw the circle again, I'll be much appreciated.{nl}
column3: 정말 감사합니다!{nl}마법진을 다시 그리는 동안 몬스터만 막아주셔도 큰 도움이 될 것 같아요.{nl}
column4: Terimakasih!{nl}Aku akan lebih menghargai jika kamu menjaga monster mendekatiku saat aku menggambar lingkaran lagi.{nl}

column2: I was just about to go to the Earth Magic Circle. Come with me.
column3: 지금 막 대지의 마법진으로 가려던 참이었는데, 같이 가시죠.
column4: Aku baru saja akan perki ke Earth Magic Circle. Ayo ikut denganku.

column2: The Sea Magic Circle only needs energy of the sea.{nl}On the Balancing Magic Circle you need to add both earth and sea energy.
column3: 바다의 마법석에는 바다의 기운만 담아야 하고요.{nl}조화의 마법석에는 대지와 바다의 기운을 똑같이 담아야 해요.
column4: Sea Magic Circle hanya membutuhkan sea energy.{nl}pada Balancing Magic Circle kamu harus menambahkan kedua energy sea dan earth energy.

column2: For the Sea Magic Stone, make sure you fill it only with sea energy.{nl}Be careful not to mix sea and earth energy.
column3: 바다의 마법석을 채울 때는 반드시 바다의 기운만을 채워주셔야해요.{nl}대지의 기운이 섞이지 않게 주의해주세요.
column4: Untuk Sea Magic Stone, pastikan kamu mengisi hanya dengan sea energy.{nl}Hati hati jangan sampai tertukar antara sea dan earth energy.

column2: Ah... wait!{nl}I think there's a problem...{nl}
column3: 아.. 잠시만요!{nl}문제가 조금 생긴 것 같아요..{nl}
column4: Ah... tunggu!{nl}Aku rasa ada masalah...{nl}

column2: Looking at the new magic circles, the Earth Magic Circle looks a little weaker than the others.{nl}I think there might have been a problem with the energy collector.{nl}
column3: 새로 그린 마법진을 다시 살펴 보니 다른 마법진에 비해 대지의 마법진이 약하더라고요.{nl}아무래도 기운 수집기에 문제가 있었던 것 같아요.{nl}
column4: Memeriksa magic circles yang baru, Earth Magic Circle tampak sedikit lemah daripada yg lain nya.{nl}Mungkin ada masalah dengan energy collector.{nl}

column2: I want to absorb some energy directly from monsters {nl}like what we did with the other magic circles.{nl}Can you help me?
column3: 그래서 말인데 다른 마법진처럼 몬스터에게서 직접 흡수한 대지의 기운이 필요할 것 같아요.{nl}조금만 더 도와주실 수 있을까요?
column4: Aku mau menyerap energi langsung dari monster {nl}Seperti yang kita lakukan dengan magic circles lain nya.{nl}Bisakah kamu menolongku?

column2: Just be careful.{nl}Make sure the sea energy doesn't mix with the earth energy.
column3: 명심하세요. {nl}대지의 마법석에 바다의 기운이 섞이면 안돼요.
column4: Berhati-hatilah.{nl}Pastikan sea energy tidak tertukar dengan earth energy.

column2: Thank you.{nl}I'll repair the Earth Magic Circle now.
column3: 감사합니다.{nl}제가 대지의 마법진을 더 튼튼하게 보수해 놓을게요.
column4: Terimakasih.{nl}Aku akan perbaiki Earth Magic Circle sekarang.

column2: Hmm... I can't help but worry about all these monsters around.{nl}But magic circle protective magic doesn't work on monsters.{nl}
column3: 흠.. 아무래도 마법진 주변의 몬스터가 너무 신경쓰여요.{nl}이상하게 마법진의 보호 마법이 몬스터에겐 소용이 없더라고요.{nl}
column4: Hmm... Aku tidak bisa membantu namun saya cemas dengan monster disekitar.{nl}Namun magic circle protective magic tidak bekerja pada monster.{nl}

column2: I should probably make more Binding Magic Circles around.{nl}I'm sorry, but just help me with this one last thing!
column3: 아무래도 마법진 주위에 구속 마법진을 더 만들어야겠어요.{nl}이왕 이렇게 된 거 조금만 더 도와주세요!
column4: Aku mungkin harus membuat lebih banyak Binding Magic Circles disekitar.{nl}Aku minta maaf, bisakah membantu untuk terakhir kali nya!

column2: When the new magic circles are completed, they disappear after a while.{nl}Don't worry about stepping on them, though, they only react to monsters.
column3: 새 마법진도 완성하고 나서 조금 지나면 모습을 감출 거에요.{nl}밟을까봐 걱정은 안하셔도 돼요. 몬스터에게만 반응하니까요.
column4: Ketika magic circles baru telah selesai, mereka akan menghilang sebentar.{nl}Jangan kawatir jika menginjak nya, mereka hanya bereaksi pada monster.

column2: The new Binding Magic Circles are ready? {nl}Thank you.{nl}
column3: 새 구속 마법진을 모두 만들어 주셨군요.{nl}감사합니다.{nl}
column4: The new Binding Magic Circles sudah siap? {nl}Terimakasih.{nl}

column2: What? Nothing happens when the monsters step on them?{nl}Ah... Maybe they need time to activate.{nl}Don't worry about it.{nl}
column3: 네? 몬스터가 밟아도 아무 일이 없더라고요?{nl}아.. 발동까지 시간이 조금 걸릴 거에요.{nl}걱정 마세요.
column4: Apa? Tidak ada reaksi apa-apa ketika monster menginjak nya?{nl}Ah... Mungkin butuh waktu untuk aktif.{nl}Jangan terlalu khawatir.{nl}

column2: Now that I think about it, the Binding Magic Circles I made before were too dangerous. {nl}Even you had a close call with them.{nl}
column3: 아무리 생각해봐도 예전에 만들어 놨었던 구속 마법진은 너무 위험한 것 같아요.{nl}당신도 그 구속 마법진 때문에 큰일날 뻔 했잖아요?{nl}
column4: Aku berfikir mengenai hal itu, Binding Magic Circles yang aku buat sebelum nya cukup berbahaya. {nl}Bahkan nyaris mencelakaimu.{nl}

column2: I think it's best to get rid of any danger.{nl}It's the last thing I'm asking you.
column3: 위험한 건 미리 제거하는 편이 좋겠지요.{nl}이것까지만 부탁드릴게요.
column4: Kupikir lebih baik menyingkirkan tingkat bahaya.{nl}Ini hal terakhir yang akuminta padamu.

column2: The Magic Searching Stone is too old so sometimes it doesn't detect magic circles that well.
column3: 마력 탐지석이 조금 오래되서 마법진을 잘 못 찾을 때도 있어요.
column4: The Magic Searching Stone sudah tua, terkadang tidak mendeteksi magic circles dengan baik.

column2: Thanks for your help.{nl}It should be safe for anyone who comes here now.
column3: 도와주셔서 감사합니다.{nl}이제 누가 와도 걱정이 없겠어요.
column4: Terimakasih atas bantuanmu.{nl}Seharus nya aman untuk semua orang yang datang kesini.

column2: I'm going to give you a Magic Searching Stone.{nl}Use it to find any hidden Binding Magic Circles.{nl}
column3: 제가 마력 탐지석을 드릴게요.{nl}이걸로 숨어있는 위험한 구속 마법진을 찾아낼 수 있어요.{nl}
column4: Aku akan memberi Magic Searching Stone padamu.{nl}Gunakan untuk mencari Binding Magic Circles yang tersembunyi.{nl}

column2: The magic circles you found will fade away with time.{nl}Luring monsters into the circles isn't a bad option either.{nl}
column3: 찾아낸 마법진은 시간이 조금 흐른 뒤에 사라질 거예요.{nl}마법진에 몬스터를 유인하는 것도 좋은 방법이죠.{nl}
column4: Magic circles yang kamu temukan akan memudar seiring waktu.{nl}Memancing monster kedalam lingkaran bukan ide yang jelek.{nl}

column2: The magic circles do disappear when you step on them, {nl}but there's no need to do anything dangerous.
column3: 직접 마법진을 밟아도 마법진이 사라지긴 하는데 굳이 위험한 일을 할 필욘 없겠죠.
column4: Magic circles memang hilang jika kamu menginjak nya,{nl}namun tidak perlu melakukan sesuatu yang berbahaya.

column2: Oh, make sure you add only sea energy to the Sea Magic Circle.{nl}The balancing one needs both earth and sea energy.
column3: 참, 바다의 마법석에는 바다의 기운만 담아야 하고요.{nl}조화의 마법석에는 대지와 바다의 기운을 똑같이 담아야 해요.{nl}
column4: Oh, pastikan kamu hanya menambahkan sea energy ke dalam Sea Magic Circle.{nl} Keseimbangan membutuhkan earth dan sea energy.

column2: Make sure you don't get them mixed up.{nl}
column3: 헷갈리지 않게 잘 부탁드립니다.{nl}
column4: Pastikan untuk tidak tertukar keduanya.{nl}

column2: Thanks to you Vera Coast is stable now.{nl}Thank you.
column3: 덕분에 베라 연안이 안정되었어요.{nl}감사합니다.
column4: Berkat kamu Vera Coast telah stabil sekarang.{nl}Terimakasih.

column2: There are three small magic circles at the Bachl Vacant Lot.{nl}If something happens to the magic circles, those circles will also react.
column3: 바흘 공터 쪽으로 가다보면 조그만 마법진이 세 개 있어요.{nl}마법진에 무슨 일이 생기면 저 마법진에도 반응이 온답니다.
column4: Ada tiga small magic circles di Bachl Vacant Lot.{nl}Jika terjadi sesuatu pada magic circles, circles tersebut juga akan bereaksi.

column2: There doesn't seem to be a reaction.
column3: 아무 반응이 없는 것 같다.
column4: Tampak nya tidak ada reaksi.

column2: Are you sure? Thank you!{nl}The method is the same as before.{nl}
column3: 정말이신가요? 감사합니다!{nl}방법은 아까와 같아요.{nl}
column4: Apakah kamu yakin? TErimakasih!{nl}Metode nya sama seperti sebelum nya.{nl}

column2: I'm going to give you an Earth Magic Stone; just put it down and defeat monsters.{nl}Also, make sure to fill it only with earth energy.
column3: 제가 대지의 마법석을 드릴테니 마법석을 놓고 주변의 몬스터를 처치해 주시면 돼요.{nl}대지의 마법석에는 대지의 기운만을 담아주셔야 하고요.
column4: Aku akan memberikanmu Earth Magic Stone; letakan dibawah dan kalahkan monster.{nl}Dan juga, pastikan hanya diisi dengan earth energy.

column2: Oh, don't worry.{nl}I made it so that it only works with monsters.{nl}
column3: 아아, 걱정 마세요. {nl}이번에는 몬스터에게만 통하도록 만들었으니까요.{nl}
column4: Oh, Jangan kuatir.{nl}Aku buat agar hanya bekerja pada monster.{nl}

column2: This is a Binding Magic Circle scroll.{nl}Take it and create Binding Magic Circles around the new circles.
column3: 여기 구속 마법진 주문서가 있어요.{nl}이걸 가지고 새로 그린 마법진 근처에 구속 마법진을 만들어 주시면 됩니다.
column4: Ini adalah Binding Magic Circle scroll.{nl}Ambil dan buat Binding Magic Circles disekitar new circles.

column2: Ahah... No matter how much I think, there is no way.{nl}Now, everything may be ruined...{nl}
column3: 아아.. 아무리 생각해도 방법이 없어.{nl}이젠 다 글렀을지도..{nl}
column4: Ahah... Mau bagaimanapun, sudah tidak ada jalan lain.{nl}Sekarang, segalanya akan sirna...{nl}

column2: I haven't seen you before.{nl}What has brought you this far?{nl}
column3: 자네는 못 보던 사람이군.{nl}어쩌다 이런 곳까지 온 거지?{nl}
column4: Aku belum pernah melihatmu sebelumnya.{nl}Apa yang membawamu sejauh ini?{nl}

column2: It doesn't matter.{nl}If you have time, could you listen to this old man for a while?
column3: 뭐, 상관 없네.{nl}별 일 없다면 잠깐 이 늙은이의 푸념이라도 듣지 않겠나?
column4: Itu tidak masalah.{nl}Jika kamu punya waktu, maukah kamu mendengarkan orangtua ini sebentar?

column2: This was... originally a sea...{nl}We were fishers who caught fishes in this sea.{nl}
column3: 여긴.. 원래 바다였네.{nl}우린 이 바다에서 물고기나 잡던 어부였지.{nl}
column4: Sebelum nya ini... Adalah lautan...{nl}Kami adalah nelayan yang menangkap ikan di laut ini.{nl}

column2: But, as you can see...{nl}The land suddenly soared upwards.{nl}
column3: 그런데 자네도 보다시피..{nl}신수의 날에 갑자기 땅이 솟아오르면서 육지가 되어버렸지 뭔가.{nl}
column4: Namun, seperti yang bisa kamu lihat...{nl}Daratan tiba-tiba timbul.{nl}

column2: At first, I was thinking whether I should quit fishing, but... it soon turned out alright.{nl}I've earned a lot of money by picking up corals. {nl}
column3: 처음엔 어부 일을 그만둬야 하나.. 싶어 정말 막막했지만, 금방 괜찮아졌어.{nl}산호 채취가 벌이는 꽤 좋았거든. {nl}
column4: Awalnya , aku berfikir untuk berhenti melaut, namun... Namun keadan berangsur membaik.{nl}Aku mendapatkan banyak uang dari mengumpulkan corals. {nl}

column2: The monsters were, without a doubt, a bit scary, but the lord was there to help us.{nl}The lord sent her army and the Lord Lieutenant in exchange for a offering.{nl}
column3: 몬스터가 조금 무섭긴 했지만, 영주님의 도움도 컸지.{nl}영주님께서 공물 약간을 조건으로 대리인과 병사들을 보내 지켜주셨으니까.{nl}
column4: Para monster menakutkan dan tanpa keraguan, sedikit menakutkan, namun the lord ada disana untuk membantu kita.{nl}The lord mengirimkan pasukan nya dan the Lord Lieutenant sebagai ganti nya kami harus memberikan upeti.{nl}

column2: But not too long ago, the monsters went crazy.{nl}We couldn't pick up the corals and even had to evacuate.{nl}
column3: 그런데 얼마 전부터, 몬스터가 심각하게 들끓기 시작했어.{nl}산호 채취는 커녕 여기서 한 발자국도 못 나갈 정도로 말야.{nl}
column4: Namun tidak lama, para monster menjadi gila.{nl}Kita tidak bisa mengumpulkan corals dan bahkan harus mengungsi.{nl}

column2: Of course, we have told the Lord Lieutenant about this.{nl}However, he said protecting the town and defeating the monsters {nl}were two different things, and the latter would cost additional tributes.{nl}
column3: 물론 영주 대리인에게 하소연도 해봤지.{nl}하지만 마을을 지켜주는 것과 몬스터를 토벌하는 것은 별도라며 공물을 더 바치라고 하더군.{nl}
column4: Tentu saja, kita harus memberitahu Lord Lieutenant mengenai hal ini.{nl}Namun, menurut nya melindungi kota dan mengalahkan monster {nl}merupakan dua hal yang berbeda, dan akan menimbulkan kerugian tambahan.{nl}

column2: We've ran out of the corals that we've collected. {nl}The merchants are waiting for us... What should we do...{nl}
column3: 이젠 모아둔 산호도 다 떨어졌어. {nl}저 상단도 우릴 안달내면서 기다리고 있을 텐데 우린 대체 어떻게 해야 할지..{nl}
column4: Kami kehabisan coral yang biasa kita kumpulkan. {nl}The merchants menunggu kami... Apa yang harus kami lakukan...{nl}

column2: I'm just saying it is.{nl}Thank you for listening to the complaints of an old man.
column3: 뭐.. 그렇다는 걸세.{nl}늙은이의 푸념을 들어줘서 정말 고맙네..
column4: Aku hanya menceritakan ini.{nl}Terimakasih telah mendengarkan curhatan orang tua ini.

column2: Hmm... Are you the rumored Revelator?{nl}I've heard you possess quite talented skills.{nl}
column3: 흠.. 당신은 소문으로 듣던 바로 그 계시자님 아니십니까.{nl}엄청난 실력을 가졌다고 들었습니다.{nl}
column4: Hmm... Apakah kamu Revelator yang digosipkan itu?{nl}Aku mendengar kamu memiliki kemampuan.{nl}

column2: Have you heard of the coral named Lhu'uvik?{nl}It's a valuable coral used for creating magical tools or for finding magic principles.
column3: 혹시 루우빅이라는 산호에 대해 아십니까?{nl}마법 도구를 만들거나 마법의 원리를 찾는데 쓰이는 아주 귀중한 산호이지요.{nl}
column4: Pernahkah kamu mendengar coral Lhu'uvik?{nl}Itu merupakan coral yang berharga untuk membuat magical tools untuk mencari magic principles.

column2: I've come all this way to trade it...{nl}But as you can probably see, I've gotten in to trouble.{nl}
column3: 전 그걸 거래하러 여기까지 왔습니다만.. {nl}보시다시피 상황이 아주 곤란하게 되어버렸어요.{nl}
column4: Aku datang sejauh ini untuk menukarkan nya...{nl}Namun seperti yang kamu liat, saya sedang dalam malasah.{nl}

column2: There is nothing more important than the schedules and the promises of a merchant.{nl}If we go empty-handed like this, we will suffer from tremendous damage.{nl}
column3: 상인에게 일정과 약속만큼 소중한 게 없는 법.{nl}이대로 빈손으로 돌아가면 우리 상단은 큰 피해를 입게 됩니다.{nl}
column4: Tidak ada yang lebih penting daripada jadwal dan janji dari merchant.{nl}Jika kita pergi dengan tangan hampa, kita akan mendapatkan kerugian yang besar.{nl}

column2: It's not only us, but it also counts for those villagers.{nl}If it continues like this, they will lose their jobs and {nl}be forced to look for other places to live.{nl}
column3: 게다가 저희 뿐만이 아니라 저 마을 사람들도 마찬가집니다.{nl}이대로라면 생업을 잃어버리고 또 살 곳을 찾아 떠돌아야 하겠지요.{nl}
column4: Bukan hanya kami, tetapi juga penting bagi warga desa.{nl}Jika terus seperti ini, mereka akan kehilangan pekerjaan dan {nl}akan terpaksa mencari tempat lain untuk tinggal.{nl}

column2: I want to borrow your power to help those poor villagers.{nl}Can you help me so that they can start collecting coral again?
column3: 저 불쌍한 마을 사람들을 보아서라도 꼭 당신의 힘을 빌리고 싶습니다.{nl}저들이 다시 산호 채취를 시작할 수 있도록 도와주실 수 없겠습니까?
column4: Aku ingin meminjam kekuatanmu untuk membantu para penduduk desa.{nl}Maukah kamu membantu agar mereka bisa mulai mencari coral lagi?

column2: Thank you for accepting.{nl}First, that lieutenant doesn't want to receive anything besides the corals for tributes.
column3: 응해 주셔서 정말 감사합니다.{nl}일단 그 대리인이라는 사람은 공물로 받는 산호 외엔 일절 받으려 하질 않더군요.{nl}
column4: Terimakasih telah menerima.{nl}Pertama, lieutenant tidak mau menerima apapun kecuali coral untuk upeti.

column2: Eventually, we will have to get rid of the monsters so that the villagers can gather corals.{nl}You are the only one I can trust, please get rid of them.{nl}
column3: 결국 마을 사람들이 산호를 캘 수 있도록 몬스터를 소탕해야 할 것 같습니다.{nl}믿을 건 당신뿐이니 처리를 부탁드리겠습니다.{nl}
column4: Nantinya, kita harus menyingkirkan monster sehingga penduduk desa bisa mengumpulkan corals.{nl}Kamu satu-satunya yang bisa kupercaya, tolong singkirkan mereka.{nl}

column2: I hope this clears things up...{nl}In case something happens, while you are taking care of it, {nl}I will send a person to look at the status of the monsters.{nl}
column3: 이걸로 단번에 처리되었으면 좋겠습니다만..{nl}혹시 모르니 당신이 처리하는 동안 사람을 보내 몬스터의 동향을 살펴 보도록 하지요.{nl}
column4: Aku harap ini bisa terselesaikan...{nl}Jika sesuatu terjadi sementara kamu mengerjakan nya, {nl}Aku akan kirimkan seseorang untuk melihat status dari monster.{nl}

column2: It will be great if we could just drive out the monsters, but...{nl}Something's up.
column3: 몬스터만 처리해서 될 일이라면 정말 다행입니다만..{nl}뭔가 찜찜한 구석이.. 가시질 않는군요.
column4: Akan sangat bagus jika kita bisa mengusir para monster, namun...{nl}Sesuatu akan muncul.

column2: Oh, you've come back already?{nl}You're just as great as I've heard.
column3: 오, 빨리도 돌아오셨군요!{nl}모두 몰아내셨다니 역시 듣던대로 대단하십니다.
column4: Oh, kamu telah kembali?{nl}Kamu sebaik seperti yang kudengar.

column2: I knew it wouldn't be that easy.{nl}It's so strange that many monsters are rushing in so quickly.
column3: 역시. 일이 쉽게 풀리진 않을거라 예상했습니다만.{nl}그 많은 몬스터들이 이렇게 짧은 시간 안에 다시 몰려드는 것도 이상하군요.{nl}
column4: Aku tau ini tidak akan mudah.{nl}Sangat aneh banyak monster yang bergegas masuk dengan cepat.

column2: This is not just related to the monsters. There must be a different reason.{nl}I will investigate this seperately. Can you ask people here if they saw anything strange?
column3: 이건 단순한 몬스터 문제가 아니라 뭔가 다른 이유가 있는 것 같습니다.{nl}전 따로 조사를 해 볼테니 여기 사람들에게 이상한 것이 없었는지 물어봐 주시겠습니까?
column4: Ini tidak hanya terkait pada monster. Pasti ada alasan lain.{nl}Aku akan menyelidiki. Bisakah kamu bertanya pada orang-orang apakah melihat sesuatu yang aneh?

column2: You would think the Lord Lieutenant would be the first one to help, but no!{nl}He would rather waste his time threatening us... How strange.{nl}
column3: 도와주진 못할 망정, 영주의 대리인씩이나 되는 사람이 으름장이라니..{nl}거 이상하군요.{nl}
column4: Kamu pasti berpikir Lord Lieutenant akan menjadi yang pertama untuk menolong kami, tapi tidak!{nl}Dia lebih suka menghabiskan waktu mengancam kami... Sangat aneh.{nl}

column2: If it was just a matter of taxing additional tributes,{nl}why doesn't the Lord Lieutenant take some measures.{nl}Anyway, how did the investigation go?{nl}
column3: 단순히 추가 공물을 받으면 될 문제라면 영주 대리인이 한 번 쯤은 먼저 나서주는 게 나을 텐데요.{nl}그나저나, 탐문은 어땠습니까?{nl}
column4: Jika itu hanyalah masalah tambahan upeti,{nl}Kenapa Lord Lieutenant mengambil suatu tindakan.{nl}Ngomong-ngomong, bagaimana penyelidikan nya?{nl}

column2: So as the number of monsters increased, the strange smell started to spread.{nl}Hmm...{nl}
column3: 몬스터가 늘어나면서 이상한 냄새가 나기 시작했다고요.{nl}흠..{nl}
column4: jadi setelah jumlah monster meningkat, bau aneh mulai menyebar.{nl}Hmm...{nl}

column2: I can't think that the monsters are not related to the smell.{nl}Can you check where that smell is coming from?{nl}
column3: 몬스터와 그 냄새가 관련이 없다곤 생각할 수 없군요.{nl}일단 냄새가 어디서 나는지 알아봐 주실 수 있을까요?{nl}
column4: Saya tidak bisa berpikir jika monster tidak berhubungan dengan bau tersebut.{nl}Bisakah kamu periksa dari mana bau tersebut berasal?{nl}

column2: If we are lucky enough, we might be able to find the source of the smell.{nl}If you find it, please bring it to me. I will get rid of it right away.
column3: 운이 좋다면 냄새가 나는 원인을 찾을 수도 있겠습니다.{nl}혹시나 발견하신다면 제게 가져다 주세요. 바로 없애버리도록 하지요.
column4: Jika kita cukup beruntung, kita mungkin akan menemukan sumber bau tersebut.{nl}Jika kamu menemukan nya, tolong berikan padaku. Aku akan menyingkirkan nya segera.

column2: I am counting on you.{nl}Please check the coast for spots where the smell is coming from.
column3: 잘 부탁드립니다.{nl}연안 곳곳에 냄새가 나는 곳부터 살펴봐 주세요.
column4: Aku mengandalkan mu.{nl}Tolong periksa pantai dimana tempat bau itu berasal.

column2: The smell and the monsters...{nl}
column3: 냄새와 몬스터라..{nl}짚히는 게 좀 있는 것 같습니다.
column4: Bau dan monster...{nl}

column2: Just as I thought! In the contents of the pouch was a powder that allures monsters.{nl}Somebody must have deliberately used them to draw the monsters in.{nl}
column3: 역시! 주머니 안에 든 건 몬스터를 유인할 때 쓰는 가루입니다.{nl}누군가 의도적으로 몬스터를 유인하고 있던 게 틀림없어요.{nl}
column4: Seperti yang kupikirkan! Dalam kantong berisi bubuk yang memancing monster.{nl}Seseorang telah sengaja menggunakan nya untuk menarik monster.{nl}

column2: If the smell disappears, there will be no reason for the monsters to go crazy.{nl}Can you dig out the same pouches from the pit?
column3: 냄새만 사라진다면 더는 몬스터가 들끓을 이유도 없을 겁니다.{nl}채취장에서 이것과 똑같은 주머니들을 찾아서 전부 파내주실 수 있을까요?
column4: Jika baunya menghilang, tidak akan ada alasan bagi monster untuk menjadi gila.{nl}Bisakah kamu mengali pouches dari lubang?

column2: I will find out more about the pouch in the meantime.{nl}I don't know yet whether it someone left it on accident or on purpose.
column3: 그 동안 전 주머니에 대해 좀 알아보도록 하지요.{nl}우연히 흘러들어 온 건지, 누가 고의로 파묻은 건지 지금으로선 알 수 없으니까요.
column4: Aku akan mencaritau lebih lanjut mengenai pouch sementara.{nl}Aku belum tahu apakah seseorang meninggalkan nya tidak sengaja atau dengan sengaja.

column2: Oh my god... This many...{nl}I can see why so many monsters are being drawn in.{nl}
column3: 세상에, 이렇게나 잔뜩..{nl}이러니 몬스터가 그렇게 몰려드는 것도 당연합니다.{nl}
column4: OMG.. Banyak sekali...{nl}Pantas saja banyak monster yang datang tertarik.{nl}

column2: Someone is definitely disturbing the coral harvesting.{nl}I don't know why, but whoever behind it must be evil.
column3: 확실히, 누군가 고의적으로 산호 채취를 방해하고 있어요.{nl}왜인진 몰라도 이런 짓까지 하다니 보통 악독한 녀석이 아니군요.
column4: Seseorang pasti mengganggu proses memanen coral.{nl}Aku tidak tau kenapa, namun siapapun dalang nya dia sangat jahat.

column2: Yes.{nl}I told you that the Lord Lieutenant is little strange.{nl}
column3: 그렇지.{nl}아까 제가 영주 대리인이 조금 이상하다고 하지 않았습니까?{nl}
column4: Yes.{nl}Aku beritahu bahwa Lord Lieutenant sedikit aneh.{nl}

column2: It would've been quite efficient if the Lord Lieutenant would personally go out and defeat the monsters.{nl}Even if this delays the tribute delivery a bit.{nl}
column3: 단순히 한 번 몬스터를 처리하는 것 정도라면 영주 대리인이 직접 나서는 게 이득이라고 했었지요.{nl}공물을 나중에 받더라도 말이예요.{nl}
column4: Akan sangat efisien jika Lord Lieutenant sendiri pergi keluar dan mengalahkan para monster.{nl}Meskipun pengiriman upeti akan tertunda sedikit.{nl}

column2: Yet, he didn't do it.{nl}
column3: 하지만 그러지 않았어요.{nl}
column4: Namun , dia tidak melakukan nya.{nl}

column2: If he knows defeating the monsters is a waste of time...{nl}I think everything is coming together, now.
column3: 만약 몬스터를 물리쳐봤자 소용 없다는 것을 본인이 제일 잘 알고 있다면.. {nl}모든 이야기가 맞춰지는 것 같네요.{nl}
column4: Jika dia tau, mengalahkan monster adalah hal yang membuang-buang waktu...{nl}Akupikir semuanya datang bersama-sama sekarang.

column2: If what I am thinking is correct, the Lord Lieutenant will try to steal the tributes.{nl}However we don't have the evidence to support that claim.{nl}
column3: 제 생각이 맞다면 영주 대리인은 결국 주기적으로 공물을 뜯어먹으려는 속셈일 겁니다.{nl}하지만 역시나 결정적인 증거가 없는 건 마찬가지이지요.{nl}
column4: Jika yang saya pikirkan benar, Lord Lieutenant akan mencoba mencuri upeti ini.{nl}Namun kita tidak punya bukti untuk terhadap tuduhan itu.{nl}

column2: Alright... Let's answer our suspicions right now. Do we lure the suspect out?{nl}I want you to be responsible for the most important role.
column3: 자.. 추측은 여기까지 하고. 어디 한번 범인을 꼬셔내 볼까요?{nl}당신이 가장 중요한 역할을 맡아 주셔야겠습니다.
column4: Baik... Ayo kita cari jawaban dari kecurigaan kita sekarang. Apakah kita memancing tersangka keluar?{nl}Aku mau kamu bertanggung jawab untuk peran yang lebih penting.

column2: I've told the Lord Lieutenant in advance.{nl}The smell was spreading badly in the pit, making it unable to bear.{nl}I've gotten rid of the source and he thanked me for that.{nl}
column3: 제가 영주 대리인에게 미리 귀띔해두지요.{nl}채취장에 냄새가 매우 고약해서 견딜 수 없어 원흉을 없애버렸으니 고마워하라고요.{nl}
column4: Aku telah mengatakan pada Lord Lieutenant sebelumnya.{nl}Bau tersebut menyebar dilubang, sangat busuk.{nl}Aku telah menyingkirkan sumbernya dan dia bertrimakasih padaku.{nl}

column2: In the meantime, please hide with the mayor.{nl}Of course, the soldier who will catch the culprit should join. {nl}He should act like an observer.{nl}
column3: 그 동안 당신은 촌장님이랑 함께 미리 숨어계세요.{nl}물론 범인을 잡을 병사도 함께 가야겠지요. 확실한 목격자 역할도 해 줘야 하니까요.{nl}
column4: Untuk sementara waktu, tolong jgn beritahu mayor.{nl}Tentu saja, tentara yang menangkap culprit harus bergabung. {nl}Dia harus bertindak seperti pengamat.{nl}

column2: Of course, we can't rule out that some of the soldiers may have had a hand in this...{nl}But, you don't have to worry since Basilius is reliable and a very close friend of mine.{nl}
column3: 물론 병사들이 가담하지 않았다곤 말은 못해도.. {nl}바질리우스는 꽤 믿음직하고 저와 친한 친구이니 걱정 안하셔도 될 겁니다.{nl}
column4: Tentu saja, kita tidak bisa mengesampingkan bahwa beberapa tentara memiliki andil...{nl}Tapi, kamu jangan khawatir karena Basilius handal dan teman dekat ku.{nl}

column2: Anyway, since the Lord Lieutenant found out that all the pouches were removed...{nl}He will appear again and bury the pocket.{nl}
column3: 자. 어쨌든 영주 대리인은 주머니를 전부 꺼냈다는 걸 알게 되었으니..{nl}분명 다시 나타나서 그 주머니를 묻으려 할 겁니다.{nl}
column4: Ngomong-ngomong, karena Lord Lieutenant telah tau bahwa semua pouches telah dipindahkan...{nl}Dia akan muncul lagi dan menguburkan the pocket.{nl}

column2: Let's strike all at once, then.{nl}I will block the retreat route in case something happens.
column3: 그 때 다 같이 현장을 덮치도록 하지요.{nl}혹시 모르니 저는 퇴로를 차단하고 있겠습니다.
column4: Ayo kita serang bersama-sama, lalu.{nl}Aku akan memblokir rute melarikan diri jika sesuatu terjadi.

column2: I am counting on you then.{nl}When you go, I will start my task as well.
column3: 그럼 잘 부탁드립니다.{nl}가시는 대로 저도 밑작업을 시작하지요.
column4: Aku mengandalkan mu.{nl}Ketika kamu pergi, Saya akan mulai tugasku.

column2: You're safe.{nl}Don't worry, the Lord Lieutenant was caught with the villagers.{nl}
column3: 무사하시군요.{nl}영주 대리인은 마을 분들과 함께 붙잡았으니 걱정 마세요.{nl}
column4: Kamu aman.{nl}Jangan takut, Lord Lieutenant tertangkap dengan penduduk desa.{nl}

column2: What a cruel and cunning man. Cowardly and dishonorable as well. {nl}He also ratted other soldiers out.{nl}
column3: 아주 악랄한 녀석이더군요.{nl}혼자 뒤집어쓰긴 싫었는지, 가담한 파견병들까지 전부 실토하더라고요.{nl}
column4: Pria yang kejam dan licik. Pengecut dan tidak terhormat. {nl}Dia juga menghianati tentara lainnya.{nl}

column2: As I expected, they were stealing the tributes.{nl}They lured the monsters and began to steal in earnest.{nl}
column3: 역시 제 생각대로, 공물을 빼돌리고 있었어요.{nl}거기에 눈이 멀었는지 몬스터까지 끌어들여 본격적으로 착취를 시작한 거지요.{nl}
column4: Sudah kuduga, mereka mencuri upeti.{nl}Mereka memancing monster dan muali mencuri nya.{nl}

column2: He was blinded by greed and endangered everyone...{nl}I am well acquainted with the lord. Let me take the other soldiers to her.{nl}
column3: 사리사욕에 눈이 멀어 모두를 위험에 빠뜨리다니..{nl}전 영주님과 친하니 다른 파견병들과 함께 제가 잘 데려가도록 하겠습니다.{nl}
column4: Ia dibutakan oleh keserakahan dan mengancam semua orang...{nl}Aku mengenal baik the lord. Biar aku bawa tentara lain nya ke dia.{nl}

column2: Due to your help, I was able to keep to the schedule and start picking up the corals again.{nl}Thank you so much. You've saved us and the villagers.
column3: 당신 덕분에 일정도 지켰고 산호 채취도 다시 시작할 수 있겠군요.{nl}정말 감사합니다. 당신이 저희와 이 마을 사람들을 구해주신 겁니다.
column4: Karena bantuan mu, saya bisa bisa mengumpulkan coral sesuai jadwal.{nl}Terimakasih banyak. Kamu menyelamatkan ku dan penduduk desa.
